T02D1184:99a-4: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa
T02D1184:99a-5: ni chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can gyi khams
T02D1184:99a-6: gsum pa mnan nas gnas pa zhes pa'i don to
T02D1184:99a-8: a'a li zla ba k'a li nyi //
T02D1184:99a-9: sa bon nang du son gyur pa //
T02D1184:99a-10: de nyid sems dpa' zhes gsungs te //
T02D1184:99a-11: mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1184:99a-13: dang por stong nyid byang chub ste //
T02D1184:99a-14: gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu //
T02D1184:99a-15: gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs //
T02D1184:99a-16: bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod //
T02D1184:99a-19: dkar mo ri dags mtshan ma 'dzin //
T02D1184:99a-21: pukka s'i ni rdo rje'i lag / ces pa la
T02D1184:99a-22: sogs pa'i mthar thug pas me long lta bu la
T02D1184:99a-23: sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1184:99a-24: phyag gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1184:99a-25: a'a li zla ba k'a li nyi /
T02D1184:99a-26: zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dag ste /
T02D1184:99a-27: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
T02D1184:99a-28: bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan //
T02D1184:99a-29: zhes pa ye shes gnyis te /
T02D1184:99a-30: dbyer med pa las stong nyid byang chub ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1184:99a-31: 'di dag gi nang du son pa'i sa bon /
T02D1184:99a-32: a'a li k'a li dag gi yi ge gang ci
T02D1184:99a-33: yang rung pa gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can ni so
T02D1184:99a-34: sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1184:99a-35: gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu //
T02D1184:99a-36: de nyid sems dpa' zhes gsungs te //
T02D1184:99a-37: zhes pa 'di gsum ka dbyer med pa ni sems dpa' bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:99a-38: gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs //
T02D1184:99a-40: mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1184:99a-41: zhes pa rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:99a-42: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:99a-43: bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod //
T02D1184:99a-44: ces pa ri khrod ma dang /
T02D1184:99a-46: g-yung mo ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir sku la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1184:99a-47: ji ltar dbyer med par gyur pa de ltar 'dod
T02D1184:99a-48: chags chen po'i rjes chags rdo rje 'chang gi rang
T02D1184:99b-0: rnam par spro zhes pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna @99b tshogs pa'i rnam par spro ba ste /
T02D1184:99b-1: spro ba'i tshul gyis bskyed pa'o //
T02D1184:99b-4: rang gi lus kyi 'od zer rnams so //
T02D1184:99b-6: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa ste /
T02D1184:99b-7: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgras bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1184:99b-8: de khyad pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis gnyis su
T02D1184:99b-9: med par gyur pa spro zhes pa'i don te gnyis
T02D1184:99b-10: su med pa rtogs pa nyid kyis sdud pa de
T02D1184:99b-11: bsgrubs na / rnal 'byor pa kun rdzob dang don
T02D1184:99b-12: dam pa dbyer med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang bdag
T02D1184:99b-13: bsgrubs na / nyid 'gyur te / gnyis 'dod pa'i phyir zhe sdang ngo //
T02D1184:99b-14: gang gi rang bzhin de ltar gyur pa de ni bdag nyid de rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D1184:99b-15: rnam pa gzhan du spro ba dang //
T02D1184:99b-16: bsdu ba'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:99b-17: de yang khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D1184:99b-19: sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1184:99b-20: sngon po ni dkar po dang nag po'o //
T02D1184:99b-21: nyi ma ni dmar po ste //
T02D1184:99b-22: sngo dang nyi ma zhes pa rdo rje gsum mo //
T02D1184:99b-23: de yang aa bdag med ma ste /
T02D1184:99b-24: de'i ngo bos snang zhing so sor gsal ba'i phyir sngo dang nyi ma'i 'od do //
T02D1184:99b-25: kha dog ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1184:99b-26: n'a da gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyis so //
T02D1184:99b-27: ban du dmar po'i spyan dang ldan //
T02D1184:99b-29: dmar po ni chags pa dang kun du chags pa'i mchan nyid de /
T02D1184:99b-31: snang ba sku rdo rje zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:99b-32: ban du ka zhes pa 'ching ba'i phyir ban du n'ad gnyis gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:99b-33: ka'i sgras thugs rdo rje'o zhes pa ban du dmar po'o //
T02D1184:99b-34: gang zhig de lta bu'i spyan ye shes yod pa de de dang ldan pa ste //
T02D1184:99b-35: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das la spyan gsum kho na'o //
T02D1184:99b-36: skra ser gyen du 'khyil pa yang /
T02D1184:99b-37: zhes pa dmar ser gnyis las ser po'o //
T02D1184:99b-38: steng du son pa'i phyir gyen du ste /
T02D1184:99b-39: gyen du ser po ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1184:99b-40: skra zhes pa kam bde ba'o //
T02D1184:99b-41: de'i dbang po ni gtso bo ste /
T02D1184:99b-42: bde ba spangs nas der mi 'gyur //
T02D1184:99b-44: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin zla pa'o zhes
T02D1184:99b-45: pa zla ba dang nyi ma'i bdag nyid can no
T02D1184:99b-47: gang zhig skra ser gyen du 'khyil pa de'o //
T02D1184:99b-48: de nyid kyi phyir me long lta bu la sogs
T02D1184:99b-49: pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can de bzhin gshegs
T02D1184:99b-50: pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya lnga po 'khor
T02D1184:100a-3: ska rags rnams kyi brgyan pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:100a-5: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang /
T02D1184:100a-6: lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid //
T02D1184:100a-7: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa ste //
T02D1184:100a-8: shes rab dang thabs dang sku gsum dang 'byung ba
T02D1184:100a-9: chen po bzhi dang ye shes lnga rnam par dag
T02D1184:100a-10: pa ni rdo rje 'chang ngo zhes pa'i don to
T02D1184:100a-11: // de yang khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D1184:100a-14: gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo nyid //
T02D1184:100a-16: gdug pa ni dbang po dang yul la lhag par
T02D1184:100a-17: gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs
T02D1184:100a-18: pa rnams so // 'di rnams 'dul ba ni chos
T02D1184:100a-19: kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:100a-22: mig ces pa mthong ba ye shes te /
T02D1184:100a-23: de de ltar gyur pa'i phyir sdang mig ces pa'o //
T02D1184:100a-24: yang na sdang ba ni khro bo'i bdag nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:100a-25: mig ni mthong ba ye shes don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:100a-26: gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i phyir sdang mi gces pa'o //
T02D1184:100a-27: brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul zhes pa //
T02D1184:100a-28: brgyad gnyis ni bcu drug go //
T02D1184:100a-30: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
T02D1184:100a-31: 'di dag gi tshul ni 'di dag gi rnam pa ste /
T02D1184:100a-32: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:100a-33: lo ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /
T02D1184:100a-34: de rnams kyang shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin brgyad nyis 'gyur gyis bcu drug go //
T02D1184:100a-35: gang gi rang bzhin 'di lta bur gyur pa de ni tshul lo //
T02D1184:100a-36: 'dis ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig
T02D1184:100a-37: gi dkyil 'khor dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang ngo
T02D1184:100a-39: de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan ma gsungs pa /
T02D1184:100a-40: g-yon na rdo rje thod pa dang //
T02D1184:100a-41: kha tv'am ga yang g-yon pa nas //
T02D1184:100a-42: g-yon na zhes pa phyag g-yon par te /
T02D1184:100a-43: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1184:100a-44: rang bzhin a'a li li n'a da'i ngo bo zla
T02D1184:100a-45: ba la rdo rje thod pa ste //
T02D1184:100a-46: rdo rje byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1184:100a-47: de yang kam thod pa ni kam bde ba'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:100a-48: de skyong bar byed pa'i phyir rdo rje thod pa'o //
T02D1184:100a-49: kha tv'am ga yang g-yon pa nas //
T02D1184:100a-50: kha tv'am ga gzugs shes rab ste //
T02D1184:100a-51: zhes pa'i gsung las bdag med ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga ste /
T02D1184:100b-0: cha bco @100b lnga'i bdag nyid kyis g-yon pa nyid dang zla ba nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:100b-2: kha tv'am ga yang g-yon pa nas //
T02D1184:100b-3: zhes pa kha tv'am ga ni brjod pa nyid de /
T02D1184:100b-4: de yang g-yon pa nas zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i phyir te /
T02D1184:100b-5: ba rnam par snang mdzad sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:100b-7: ma lnga pa bsdus pas mi bskyod pa thugs rdo rje ste /
T02D1184:100b-9: g-yas na rdo rje nag po nyid //
T02D1184:100b-10: ces pa g-yas nyi ma la /
T02D1184:100b-11: rdo rje nag po zhes pa nag po de nyid rdo rje ste /
T02D1184:100b-12: mi phyed pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:100b-13: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa shes rab dang thabs dag gis h'um yig go //
T02D1184:100b-15: yi ge las byung gong bu ni //
T02D1184:100b-16: h'um ste phat yig 'dod ma yin //
T02D1184:100b-17: zhes pa'i gsungs las h'um yig kho na shes rab dang thabs dag gis sa bon te /
T02D1184:100b-18: de'i phyir phat yig tha dad pa'i bya ba 'dod ma yin zhes pa mi 'dod pa nyid do //
T02D1184:100b-19: 'di gnyis ka dbyer med pa gang yin pa de brjod pa'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1184:100b-20: n'a da'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:100b-21: de nyid kyi phyir gsung pa ;
T02D1184:100b-22: dur khrod du ni mgon po rol //
T02D1184:100b-23: rnal 'byor ma brgyad yong sa bskor ba //
T02D1184:100b-24: zhes pa dur khrod kyi sgra'i don ni bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis gsal bar mdzad de /
T02D1184:100b-25: dbugs rgyu ba dbugs 'byung ba dang /
T02D1184:100b-26: 'jug par byed pa a'a li dang k'a li n'a
T02D1184:100b-27: da'i bdag nyid kyis zhes pa'i rigs pa 'dis gnyig
T02D1184:100b-29: dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod //
T02D1184:100b-31: 'di la spro ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa ni rol ba'o //
T02D1184:100b-32: rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor ba //
T02D1184:100b-33: zhes pa khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ste /
T02D1184:100b-34: de nyid kyi phyir mgon po 'jig rten gsum gyi
T02D1184:100b-35: bla ma zhes pa'i don to zhes pa shes rab
T02D1184:100b-36: dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid kyis phyag gnyis pa
T02D1184:100b-37: gsungs pa'o // de nyid rdo rje 'chang phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1184:100b-38: gang gi phyir bdud bzhi las rgyal ba rnam par
T02D1184:100b-39: dag pa ste zhes pa bdud bzhi ni phung po'i
T02D1184:100b-40: bdud gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1184:100b-41: do // nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni nyon mongs par byed pa ste /
T02D1184:100b-42: dbang po dang yul gzung ba dang 'dzin par mngon
T02D1184:100b-43: par zhen pas rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir nyon mongs
T02D1184:100b-44: pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin no
T02D1184:101a-0: // lha'i bu'i bdud ni lha zhes pa rtse zhing rol pa'i phyir rnam par shes @101a * //
T02D1184:101a-2: / dbang po dang yul la sogs pa rnams ni de'i bu ste /
T02D1184:101a-3: des bskyed pa'i phyir lha'i bu dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams so //
T02D1184:101a-4: 'chi bdag gi bdud ni 'chi bdag gshin rje 'jig byed ces pa ste /
T02D1184:101a-5: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams
T02D1184:101a-6: kyis bskyed pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa
T02D1184:101a-8: de yang dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes
T02D1184:101a-9: pa 'gog pa'i rang bzhin yin yang chags pa'i mtshan
T02D1184:101a-10: nyid kyi phyir bdud nyid do zhes pa bdud bzhi
T02D1184:101a-11: ste / de rnams las rgyal ba ni lhag ma med par brtul ba'o //
T02D1184:101a-12: de rnam par dag pa zhes pa bde ba la
T02D1184:101a-13: sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1184:101a-14: las 'das pa rdo rje 'chang zhes pa'i don to
T02D1184:101a-15: // de yang gong du brjod pa'i sku mdog dang /
T02D1184:101a-16: gzugs can h'um las byung ba'o //
T02D1184:101a-17: mtshan ma yang tha dad med pa'i mtshan nyid kho na tha dad pas gsungs pa /
T02D1184:101a-18: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa
T02D1184:101a-19: lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi khrag gis gang
T02D1184:101a-20: ba zhes pa / dang po ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D1184:101a-21: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sdud pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir g-yon pa ni zla ba'o //
T02D1184:101a-22: de yang dga' ba bzhi longs spyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis phyag ste /
T02D1184:101a-23: de las skyes pa'i thod pa ni mi'i bde ba rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes so //
T02D1184:101a-24: lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi khrag gis gang
T02D1184:101a-25: ba ni brtse ba'i phyir lha gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D1184:101a-27: lha ma yin ni yul lnga'o //
T02D1184:101a-28: de rnams kyi khrag ni 'dod chags te /
T02D1184:101a-29: de rnams la chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1184:101a-30: de yis gang ba ni de'i bdag nyid kyis spro ba'i ngo bos rnam par gnas so zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:101a-31: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na rdo rje zhes pa g-yas na nyi ma ste /
T02D1184:101a-32: de yang phyag ni khams gsum pa za ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1184:101a-33: dang po ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D1184:101a-34: de la rdo rje zhes pa mi phyed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:101a-35: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis zhes pa /
T02D1184:101a-36: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis po zla ba
T02D1184:101a-37: dang nyi ma dag 'dres par gyur ba'i phyir ro
T02D1184:101a-38: // lhag ma ni lhag ma nyid de shes rab
T02D1184:101a-39: la 'khyud pa ni gnyis po dag gis 'khyud pa'i
T02D1184:101a-40: phyir gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid do zhes
T02D1184:101a-42: shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni //
T02D1184:101a-43: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can te //
T02D1184:101a-44: bdag med ma dang rdo rje dag la tha dad
T02D1184:101b-0: @101b med pa nyid do zhes pa kye'i rdo rje
T02D1184:101b-1: phyag bzhi ba'o // de nyid phyag drug pa ste /
T02D1184:101b-3: zhal gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa drug bsdus pa'i rnam pa ste /
T02D1184:101b-4: de yang zhal gsum zhes pa sku gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:101b-5: g-yon dmar ba zhes pa g-yon zla ba'o //
T02D1184:101b-6: de nyid dmar ba ni nye ma ste /
T02D1184:101b-10: de yang nyi ma lta bu ni aa bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:101b-11: de'i ngo bos skyes pa'i phyir aa ru na ste /
T02D1184:101b-12: lta bu ni 'dis so sor gsal ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o //
T02D1184:101b-13: de yang dang po ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D1184:101b-14: de nyid kyi phyir sngon po dkar po dang nag po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1184:101b-15: de nyid kyi phyir gcer bu sgrib pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:101b-16: gong du brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can zhes
T02D1184:101b-17: pa h'um yig gi rang bzhin kho na bcom ldan
T02D1184:101b-19: phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
T02D1184:101b-20: dag pa'o zhes pa phyag rnams kyi rnam par dag
T02D1184:101b-21: pa bsdus pa'o // gang zhe na /
T02D1184:101b-22: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
T02D1184:101b-23: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:101b-24: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa zhes pa g-yon pa ni zla ba'o //
T02D1184:101b-25: longs spyod cing za ba'i phyir zhes pa'i don las phyag ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1184:101b-26: 'di gnyis ka yang dang po gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D1184:101b-28: de la rtse gsum pa zhes pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum mo //
T02D1184:101b-29: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na zhes pa g-yas pa ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1184:101b-30: phyag ni bshad zin pa'i don to //
T02D1184:101b-31: dang po ni rnam par snang mdzad sku rdo rje
T02D1184:101b-32: snang ba'i mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang
T02D1184:101b-34: nyi ma yang bdag med ma yin pa'i phyir phyag
T02D1184:101b-35: g-yas kyi dang po kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T02D1184:101b-36: dbyer med pa'o // rdo rje ni sku rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:101b-37: phyag g-yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu zhes pa g-yon pa ni zla ba'o //
T02D1184:101b-38: gnyis pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1184:101b-39: de yang phyag ni sdud pa'i rnam pa ste ;
T02D1184:101b-40: de 'dril bu zhes pa de la a'a li k'a
T02D1184:101b-41: li gnyis ka'i n'a da dbye ba med pa'i rang
T02D1184:101b-43: phyag g-yas kyi gnyis pa ni gri gug ces pa g-yas pa ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1184:101b-44: de'i gnyis pa ni zla ba yin pa'i phyir g-yas kyi gnyis pa ste /
T02D1184:101b-45: de dag 'dres par 'gyur ba ni phyag go //
T02D1184:102a-1: pa thams cad gcod par byed pa thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:102a-2: phyag lhag ma gnyis la rdo rje lhags sgrog ma snyoms par zhugs pa zhes pa /
T02D1184:102a-3: lhag ma ni ma lus pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:102a-4: lhag ma gnyis kyang phyag gnyis shes rab dang thabs
T02D1184:102a-5: dbyer med par gyur ba la zhes phyag lhag ma
T02D1184:102a-6: gnyis so // der rdo rje lcags sgrog ma snyoms
T02D1184:102a-7: par zhugs zhes ba rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgras
T02D1184:102a-8: ni rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:102a-9: de lcags sgrog gi tshul gyis phan tshun dbye ba
T02D1184:102a-10: med pas 'ching ba rdo rje lcags sgrog ma bdag
T02D1184:102a-11: med ma'o // de yis lhan cig snyoms par zhugs
T02D1184:102a-12: pa zhes pa mnyam pa'i rang bzhin tha dad med
T02D1184:102a-13: pa'i ngo bos zhugs pa yang dag pa'i ye shes
T02D1184:102a-14: med ma'o // so // rgyu des na bcom ldan
T02D1184:102a-15: 'das ji lta ba de lta bu'i shes rab ste
T02D1184:102a-16: med ma'o // so // / de nyid kyi phyir
T02D1184:102a-17: shes rab dang thabs dag la dbye ba 'ga' yang
T02D1184:102a-18: med do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:102a-19: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa na gri gug dang thod
T02D1184:102a-20: pa zhes pa g-yas pa ni nyi ma cha dang
T02D1184:102a-21: bral ba'o // g-yon pa na ni zla ba cha dang bas pa ste /
T02D1184:102a-22: cha dang bral ba nyid cha dang bcas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:102a-23: 'di dag gi byed pa kho na gri gug dang thod pa ste /
T02D1184:102a-24: gri gug bdag med ma dang thod pa rdo rje
T02D1184:102a-25: 'chang gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid kyis gcig gi
T02D1184:102a-26: tshig go // de nyid kyi phyir khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa ste /
T02D1184:102a-27: khams gsum gyi sgras rdo rje gsum mo //
T02D1184:102a-28: de'i bdag nyid can de'i ngo bo'i ro chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:102a-29: mnan pa zhes pa khyab par bya ba dang khyab
T02D1184:102a-30: par byed pa'i ngo bos mnan pa zhes pa'i don
T02D1184:102a-31: to zhes pa lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o zhes pa
T02D1184:102a-32: gang gi phyir lus la byung ba'i phyir /
T02D1184:102a-33: lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya //
T02D1184:102a-34: zhes pa'i gsung las lha ni n'a das 'khyud pa'i thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:102a-35: de yang bad g-yogs pa ste /
T02D1184:102a-36: de len cing 'dzin pa'i phyir lha'i le'u'o //
T02D1184:102a-37: de yang gsum pa ni sku gsung thugs gsum po rnams kyi rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1184:102a-38: sku mdog dang phyag dang dbyibs kyi rnam pas sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:102a-39: de yang sa bon las skyes pa'i phyir sngags kyi
T02D1184:102a-40: rnam pa dang bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod
T02D1184:102a-41: ces pa'i gsung las ye shes kyi rnam pa ste
T02D1184:102a-42: / le'u gsum pa 'di ni le'u gsum gyi bdag nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:102b-0: n'a da rnam @102b shes las skye zhing //
T02D1184:102b-1: n'a da las ni sku skye 'gyur //
T02D1184:102b-2: zhes ba sku dang n'a da dang /
T02D1184:102b-3: rnam shes gsum po gnyis su med //
T02D1184:102b-4: rnam shes las skyes n'a da ste //
T02D1184:102b-5: de yis kyang ni sprul pa sku //
T02D1184:102b-6: gnyis po bskyed par grub pa ste //
T02D1184:102b-7: rnam pa shes pa gang gis sprul //
T02D1184:102b-8: ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1184:102b-9: rnam shes de ni 'od gsal lo //
T02D1184:102b-10: de yis kyang ni bskyed pa gang //
T02D1184:102b-11: de yang ji ltar skyes par brjod //
T02D1184:102b-12: de phyir sku dang n'a da ste //
T02D1184:102b-13: gnyis po 'di ni ma skyes pa //
T02D1184:102b-14: gnyis ka skyes par ma grub na //
T02D1184:102b-15: ma skyes pa ni bden par brjod //
T02D1184:102b-16: zhes pa 'gro kun ma skyes pa //
T02D1184:102b-17: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1184:102b-18: ma rig pa yi gdug sems kyis //
T02D1184:102b-19: skye ba ru ni yongs su brtag / de ni rnam dag don 'di nyid //
T02D1184:102b-20: snying brtse ldan pa gtso chen po //
T02D1184:102b-21: gnyis ka dbyer med kyi rdo rje //
T02D1184:102b-22: dag pa dag ni bshad pa yin //
T02D1184:102b-23: de nyid kyi phyir thugs rnam par dag pa nag
T02D1184:102b-24: po chen po phyag gnyis pa shes rab dang thabs
T02D1184:102b-27: / phyag bzhi pa sngon po ni dkar po dang
T02D1184:102b-28: nag po nyid las shes rab dang thabs dbyer med
T02D1184:102b-30: phyag drug pa sngon po ni dkar po dang nag po dang /
T02D1184:102b-31: nyi ma ni dmar po nyid las rdo rje gsum
T02D1184:102b-32: dbyer med pa ste shes rab dang thabs kyi phyag
T02D1184:102b-33: drug pa'o // phyag bcu drug pa ni nag bo dang dmar po dang dkar po'i zhal gsum mo //
T02D1184:102b-34: du ba lta bus rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1184:102b-35: lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin //
T02D1184:102b-37: dga' ba bzhi'i dbye bas zhal brgyad dang shes rab
T02D1184:102b-38: dang thabs rnam par dag pas phyag bcu drug pa'o
T02D1184:102b-39: zhes pa phyag gnyis pa dang /
T02D1184:102b-41: phyag drug pa dang phyag bcu drug pa'i he ru
T02D1184:102b-42: ka bzhi po 'di dag gong nas gong du ye
T02D1184:102b-43: shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1184:102b-44: dbyer med pas blta bar bya'o zhes pa le'u gsum
T02D1184:102b-45: po zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor
T02D1184:102b-46: dri ma med pa las le'u gsum pa'o /
T02D1184:102b-48: // / da ni rdo rje rigs kyi le'u la sogs
T02D1184:102b-49: pa gsum gyis rdo rje gsum mngon par brjod nas
T02D1184:102b-50: / de dag dbyer med pa bzhi pa dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D1184:102b-51: dbang bskur ba ni kun nas 'khyud pa ste ji
T02D1184:102b-52: srid sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid kyis rnam par
T02D1184:102b-53: dag pa dang / dri ma med par byed pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:103a-0: lha rnams kyis dbang bskur ba @103a * //
T02D1184:103a-2: de yang pad ni g-yogs pa ste /
T02D1184:103a-3: de len cing 'dzin pa'i phyir lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u'o //
T02D1184:103a-5: rab tu bstan par bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:103a-6: rang gi snying gar rang gi sa bon las 'thon pa'i 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pas /
T02D1184:103a-7: khams gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la /
T02D1184:103a-8: ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1184:103a-9: rang gi snying gar zhes pa ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D1184:103a-10: 'khor dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dbyer med pa'i
T02D1184:103a-11: lha'i snying gar rang gi sa bon h'um yig ste
T02D1184:103a-12: / sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:103a-13: de'i lte ba'i nang nas 'thon cing spros te 'od
T02D1184:103a-14: zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa sdigs mdzub lta
T02D1184:103a-15: bu mtshon par byed pa'i rang bzhin des /
T02D1184:103a-16: mtshon par bya ba'i rang bzhin khams gsum na bzhugs
T02D1184:103a-17: pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkug cing spyan drangs la
T02D1184:103a-18: / ma mo brgyad rnal 'byor ma brgyad po rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1184:103a-20: gling bu ma la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod byas nas /
T02D1184:103a-21: rjes su phye nas don du gnyer zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:103a-22: yang na rang gi snying gar zhes pa bsdus nas snying gar bkug pa na /
T02D1184:103a-23: yo g'i zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02D1184:103a-24: zhes pa 'dis mi bskyod pa'i ngo bos rdzogs pa'i
T02D1184:103a-25: lha'i snying gar rang gi sa bon las zhes pa
T02D1184:103a-26: h'um yig gi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang las 'thon
T02D1184:103a-27: pa'i 'od zer nag po zhes pa /
T02D1184:103a-28: spros pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:103a-29: 'od zer lcags gyu'i rnam pa des //
T02D1184:103a-30: zhes pa a'am aa yig la sogs pa aam yig gi bar gyis mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'o //
T02D1184:103a-31: de rnams rtogs pa'i phyir aam dku sha'o //
T02D1184:103a-32: de yang rnam pa ni bdag med ma'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:103a-33: rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med par byer med pa des /
T02D1184:103a-34: khams gsum na bzhugs ba sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa ni khams gsum mo //
T02D1184:103a-35: der bzhugs pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis rnam par
T02D1184:103a-36: gnas pa'i sangs rgyas me long lta bu la sogs
T02D1184:103a-37: pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can de bzhin gshegs
T02D1184:103a-38: pa lnga rnams spyan drangs shing bsdus la /
T02D1184:103a-39: ma mo brgyad kyis ces pa goo r'i la sogs pa lngas yul lnga dang /
T02D1184:103b-0: sha ba r'i @103b la sogs pa gsum gyis rdo rje gsum mo //
T02D1184:103b-1: 'di rnams kyang ma lta bur skyed par byed pa ste /
T02D1184:103b-2: gzung bas mngon par zhen pas 'dzin pa nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:103b-3: gnyis ka yang lha'i rnam pas rnam par sbyang bar bya zhing sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ched du'o //
T02D1184:103b-7: dbang po dang yul dag la mngon par zhen pa
T02D1184:103b-8: med pa rab tu 'jug pa'i 'di nyid ni yang
T02D1184:103b-9: dag pa'i mchod pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1184:103b-10: gsol ba gdab par ya'o zhes pa rjes su mtshungs pa la /
T02D1184:103b-11: mtshungs pa nyid kyis gsol ba gang ba ste /
T02D1184:103b-12: mgon po'i ngo bo rgyur par bya'o //
T02D1184:103b-13: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mkha' 'gro ma dag la dbye ba med do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:103b-14: de ci ltar gsol ba gdab ce na /
T02D1184:103b-16: aa bhi shi nytsa tu m'i sarba t'a tha ga
T02D1184:103b-17: t'a zhes pa rnam pa thams cad kyis shin tu
T02D1184:103b-18: rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
T02D1184:103b-19: du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad du
T02D1184:103b-20: gsol zhes pa'o // yang na bdag la dbang bskur du gsol /
T02D1184:103b-21: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i de bzhin
T02D1184:103b-22: gshegs pa thams cad bdag la mdzad du gsol zhes
T02D1184:103b-23: pa ste / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D1184:103b-24: dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang zhes pa'i don to
T02D1184:103b-25: pa ste / // sangs rgyas de rnams kyis he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis /
T02D1184:103b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi
T02D1184:103b-27: lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar
T02D1184:103b-28: bya'o // sangs rgyas de rnams kyis he ru ka'i
T02D1184:103b-29: rnam pa'i gzugs kyis zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa
T02D1184:103b-30: bya'o // ste / gzhan du lha gang bsgom par
T02D1184:103b-31: bya ba'i lha de dang de nyid kyi gzugs kyis
T02D1184:103b-32: blta bar bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:103b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin /
T02D1184:103b-34: bdud rtsi lngar bsgrubs pa'i bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur zhing brkur zhing bkru bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:103b-36: sangs rgyas me long lta bu la sogs pa ye
T02D1184:103b-37: shes lnga'i rang bzhin de rnams kyis he ru ka'i
T02D1184:103b-38: rnam par gzugs gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1184:103b-39: so // de nyid kyi phyir bdud rtsi lngar gyur pa'i ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyis te /
T02D1184:103b-41: bum pa de rnams kyis kam bde ba'i ye shes dang /
T02D1184:103b-42: la sha ba rol sgeg gi phyir ye shes kyi
T02D1184:103b-43: ngo bor gcig pa'i bum pa lnga'i bdag nyid de
T02D1184:104a-1: lnga po 'di rnams la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1184:104a-2: rnam pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:104a-3: dbang bskur zhing khrus bya ba 'di lta bu'i skad
T02D1184:104a-4: cig la spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi dbang por
T02D1184:104a-5: 'gyur ro // 'di ni he ru ka rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1184:104a-6: yang na dpang bskur ba na zhes pa sgrib pa
T02D1184:104a-7: dang bral ba nyid thob par gyur pa na me
T02D1184:104a-8: tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro zhes pa me
T02D1184:104a-9: tog rdul dang char byang chub kyi sems kyi khu
T02D1184:104a-10: ba ni me tog gi char 'bab pa ste /
T02D1184:104a-11: gnyis su med pa rtogs pas sprul pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:104a-12: nga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa rnga'i sgra
T02D1184:104a-13: ni n'a nga'i phreng ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1184:104a-14: a'a li'i rang bzhin gyis n'a de steng du 'byung
T02D1184:104a-15: zhing n'a da gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i ye shes
T02D1184:104a-16: spro ba'i phyir / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:104a-17: gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro zhes pa
T02D1184:104a-18: gur gum ni bdag med ma byang chub kyi sems
T02D1184:104a-20: / char ni thabs kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems zhu ba ste /
T02D1184:104a-21: gnyis ka dbyer med par 'bab pa chos kyi skur 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:104a-22: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod
T02D1184:104a-23: par bya'o zhes pa shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1184:104a-24: bzhin gyis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa de las
T02D1184:104a-29: reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1184:104a-30: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma zhes pa drug mi phyed pas bskyed pa ni mchod pa'o //
T02D1184:104a-31: mi phyed pa'i sgra ni rdo rje'i glu ste /
T02D1184:104a-32: spyan la sogs pa 'byung pa chen po bzhi'i rang
T02D1184:104a-33: bzhin rnams kyis blang bar bya zhing mtshon par bya
T02D1184:104a-34: ste / mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor
T02D1184:104a-35: gnyis kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes
T02D1184:104a-36: rab tu rtogs par bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:104a-38: sgrib pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid thob par gyur pa na /
T02D1184:104a-39: spyi bor spyi gtsug tu byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i rang bzhin la /
T02D1184:104a-40: rang gi rigs kyi dbang po mi bskyod ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:104a-41: 'dis ni rgyu 'dis he ru ka rdzogs pa'o zhes
T02D1184:104a-42: pa rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni he ru ka
T02D1184:104a-43: nyid de he ru ka'i sgra'i don yang /
T02D1184:104a-44: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rgyu sogs spangs pa zhes pa 'dis gsal bar bshad do //
T02D1184:104b-0: thun gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i @104b bsgom pa rnam par bsgoms nas langs te /
T02D1184:104b-1: lha'i skur gzhag par bya'o zhes pa snga dro dang
T02D1184:104b-2: nyin gung dang phyi dro'i dus su byin gyis brlab
T02D1184:104b-3: pa'i sgom pa bskyed par snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
T02D1184:104b-4: par bsgoms nas gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor gnas
T02D1184:104b-6: spro bas gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:104b-7: yang na thun gsum du byin gyis brlab pa bsgom pa zhes pa /
T02D1184:104b-8: thun gsum ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1184:104b-10: gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes so //
T02D1184:104b-11: byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom pa zhes pa dbang bskur
T02D1184:104b-12: ba'i bar gyis sgrib pa med pa'i gnas thob pa'o
T02D1184:104b-13: ; bsgoms nas langs te zhes pa'i don ni brjod zin to //
T02D1184:104b-14: lha'i skur gzhag par bya'o zhes pa /
T02D1184:104b-15: lha ni ye shes te don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1184:104b-16: sku ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
T02D1184:104b-17: bden pa gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyis lha'i sku'o //
T02D1184:104b-18: gzhag par bya'o zhes ba rdo rje 'chang gi gnas rdzogs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:104b-19: dbang bskur pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o zhes pa /
T02D1184:104b-20: kun nas sgrib pa dang bral bar byed pa'o //
T02D1184:104b-22: phat ni g-yogs pa ste de len cing 'dzin pa'i phyir le'u'o //
T02D1184:104b-23: bzhi pa ni bzhi rnams kyi rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1184:104b-24: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:104b-25: rdo rje rigs kyi le'us sku rdo rje dang /
T02D1184:104b-26: sngags kyi le'us gsung rdo rje dang /
T02D1184:104b-27: lha'i le'us thugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1184:104b-28: dbang bskur ba'i le'us rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o zhes pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1184:104b-29: las kyi phyag rgya la dga' ba bzhi'i rim pas so //
T02D1184:104b-30: chos kyi phyag rgyal 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pas gtum mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1184:104b-31: phyag rgya chen po la phyag rgya bzhi dbyer med pas so //
T02D1184:104b-32: dam tshig gi phyag rgya la rnam pa thams cad
T02D1184:104b-33: mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o
T02D1184:104b-34: // zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor
T02D1184:104b-35: shin tu dri ma med pa las le'u bzhi pa'o
T02D1184:104b-37: // / // / da ni de nas de kho na'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:104b-38: de la de kho na bzhi ste /
T02D1184:104b-40: sngags kyi de kho na dang /
T02D1184:104b-42: ye shes kyi de kho na'o //
T02D1184:104b-43: rdo rje rigs kyi le'ur bdag gi de kho na'o //
T02D1184:104b-44: sngags kyi le'ur sngags kyi de kho na'o //
T02D1184:104b-45: lha'i le'ur lha'i de kho na'o //
T02D1184:104b-46: dbang bskur ba'i le'ur ye shes kyi de kho na'o
T02D1184:104b-47: zhes pa de kho na bzhi mngon par brjod nas
T02D1184:105a-1: pa las shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi
T02D1184:105a-2: dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje 'chang nyid rab tu
T02D1184:105a-4: de nas zhes pa de ma thag par ma chad
T02D1184:105a-5: pa nyid kyis de kho na'i le'ur rab tu bshad
T02D1184:105a-8: ngo bos gzugs med ces pa rang gi gzugs ni ngo po ste /
T02D1184:105a-9: gang gi gzugs gang yin pa de ni de'i gzugs te /
T02D1184:105a-12: de ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gang gi tshe /
T02D1184:105a-13: gzugs nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
T02D1184:105a-17: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par
T02D1184:105a-18: shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o zhes pa la
T02D1184:105a-19: sogs pa'o // mthong ba yang med ces pa mthong
T02D1184:105a-20: ba yang mthong ba'i rang rang gi ngo bos med
T02D1184:105a-22: le'u dang po bdag gi de kho na'o //
T02D1184:105a-23: sgra med thos pa po yang med //
T02D1184:105a-25: de kho na ltar thams cad du ngo bos zhes pa sbyar bar bya ste /

T02D1184:106a-30: de'i tshe sdug bsngal byed do //

T02D1184:106b-4: // de nyid kyi phyir thar pa thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //

T02D1184:106b-33: chen dbang po'i rigs mtha' nyid du gsungs so zhes
T02D1184:106b-34: pa'o // snying rje chen po dam pa yi //

T02D1184:114b-41: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las bdag med ma'i rang
T02D1184:114b-42: bzhin kho na'o zhes pa shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1184:114b-43: rang bzhin gyi rgyan thams cad rnal 'byor pas gzung
T02D1184:114b-45: yang na bsgom pa pos de kho na dang ldan pas lha'i rna rgyan /
T02D1184:114b-46: rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med //
T02D1184:114b-47: ces pa'i gsung las lha'i rna rgyan de yang 'od dpag med de /
T02D1184:114b-48: de yang lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:115a-0: @115a * // a'a li dang k'a li gnyis kyis n'a da gnyis las rdzogs pa'i phyir rna bdag la'o //
T02D1184:115a-1: de gnyis kyi phyir de rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1184:115a-2: tshul gyis 'dzin cing tha dad med par byed pa'i
T02D1184:115a-3: phyir rnam pa gzung ba zhes pa gsung rdo rje'i
T02D1184:115a-4: rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1184:115a-7: dkyil 'khor ba'i bdag po nyid kyis 'khor lo ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1184:115a-10: bde chen kam la gnas pa gang /
T02D1184:115a-12: rnam par 'dzin zhes pa 'khor lo mi bskyod pa
T02D1184:115a-13: de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin
T02D1184:115a-14: cing gzung par bya ba dang /
T02D1184:115a-15: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa dbyer med par byed pa'o //
T02D1184:115a-16: de ni bya ba'i tshul nyid kyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1184:115a-18: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa nyid mi bskyod pa thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1184:115a-19: lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis //
T02D1184:115a-21: lnga'i bdag nyid gnyis kyis dbang po dang yul gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:115a-22: lag gdub kyi sgras rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1184:115a-23: snang ba'i mtshan nyid sku rdo rje sprul pa'i sku /
T02D1184:115a-24: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa'i gsung las so //
T02D1184:115a-25: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can rig pa
T02D1184:115a-26: dang snang ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gsungs te
T02D1184:115a-27: / sku gsum gyi ngo bo kho na'o //
T02D1184:115a-28: rnal 'byor pa rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni de ltar rgyan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:115a-29: 'di rnams nyid shes rab dang thabs dbyer med par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1184:115a-30: rked pa la yang ska rags nyid //
T02D1184:115a-32: kam bde ba chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1184:115a-33: de las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ka ti bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:115a-34: de la khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed
T02D1184:115a-35: pa'i rang bzhin las rten dang brten pa nyid kyis
T02D1184:115a-36: ska rags don yod grub pa sku rdo rje ste
T02D1184:115a-37: / skar gsal ni don yod gnas //
T02D1184:115a-39: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa nyid sku rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:115a-40: rkang pa dag la rkang gdub ste /
T02D1184:115a-41: zhes pa rkang pa dag la ye shes gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid rkang gdub ste /
T02D1184:115a-42: a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis so //
T02D1184:115a-43: de bzhin du gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid du gsung rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:115a-44: dpung pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan dang //
T02D1184:115b-0: ba byang chub kyi @115b sems so //
T02D1184:115b-2: de'i ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1184:115b-5: au rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1184:115b-6: des brgyan pa'i phyir hu rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin nyid byang chub kyi sems zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:115b-7: b'a hu'i sgras de gnyis ka dbyer med pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can ging yin pa'o //
T02D1184:115b-8: de nyid rtsa ba ste dang po dang gtso bo'o //
T02D1184:115b-9: de las 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D1184:115b-11: sa ni pukka s'i ru brjod //
T02D1184:115b-12: ces pa'i gsung las pukka s'i'o //
T02D1184:115b-16: ae chos 'byung nam mkha'i khams so zhes pa dpung
T02D1184:115b-17: rgyan 'byung ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi ye
T02D1184:115b-18: shes so // dang yig las gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid thugs rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:115b-19: mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1184:115b-21: mgrin pa'i sgras mgrin pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo nyid kyis /
T02D1184:115b-23: 'dab ma bcu drug las stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
T02D1184:115b-24: de las rten dang brten pa'i dngos po khyab par bya ba dang /
T02D1184:115b-25: khyab par byed pa nyid kyis mi'i rus pa chos
T02D1184:115b-26: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las mkha' 'gro ma rnams
T02D1184:115b-27: so // de rnams kyi phreng ba ste /
T02D1184:115b-28: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i
T02D1184:115b-29: bdag nyid kyis 'di rnams spro ba'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1184:115b-30: do // dang po dang mthar na rgyan dang mgul rgyan /
T02D1184:115b-31: 'od dpag med dang rin chen dbang po dang /
T02D1184:115b-32: khu ba dang khrag gi ngo bo bskyed pa dang 'jig pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D1184:115b-33: zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin dag las 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin rin chen dbang po ste /
T02D1184:115b-34: mgul ba'i phreng ba rin chen dbang ;
T02D1184:115b-36: a'a li k'a li n'a da dbyer med pa dag las rdo rje gsum dang /
T02D1184:115b-37: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid bzhi pa lhan cig skyes
T02D1184:115b-38: pa'i rang bzhin de kho na gnyis su med pa
T02D1184:115b-39: ni de kho na dang ldan pa'i rgyan no zhes
T02D1184:115b-42: de'i bgo ba stag gi pags pa dang /
T02D1184:115b-43: de'i bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed do zhes pa /
T02D1184:115b-44: bdud rtsi lnga ni ji ltar 'o ma la sogs
T02D1184:115b-45: pa bdud rtsi ba zhin du bza' bar bya ba
T02D1184:115b-46: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D1184:115b-48: thams cad nas kun tu bsgrubs pa ni bgo ba ste /
T02D1184:116a-1: pags pa zhes pa gzugs sna tshogs pa spro ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1184:116a-2: de nyid kyi phyir bza' ba thim pa mi 'chi
T02D1184:116a-3: bcu phyed ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag
T02D1184:116a-4: nyid kyi ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bo zhes pa
T02D1184:116a-5: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa sku rdo rje rdo
T02D1184:116a-6: rje rigs kyi le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad
T02D1184:116a-7: pa'o // 'dir he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ni
T02D1184:116a-8: he ru ka'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1184:116a-9: pa'o // pa ste / rigs lnga la ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1184:116a-10: bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang //
T02D1184:116a-11: rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dang //
T02D1184:116a-12: mthar skyes de lnga rnams la'o //
T02D1184:116a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams la'o //
T02D1184:116a-20: rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1184:116a-21: rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtags //
T02D1184:116a-22: rigs lnga rnams 'dres par gyur pa gang yin pa de rigs gcig ste /
T02D1184:116a-25: slar brtags zhes pa gcig nyid brtags pa'i dbang las zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:116a-27: rigs gcig dang ni du ma yis //
T02D1184:116a-28: ging phyir g-yo ba mtshon mi bya //
T02D1184:116a-29: gcig gis kyang rgyu gang gi phyir dbye ba tha dad pa mtshon mi bya /
T02D1184:116a-32: he ru ka sbyor zhes pa rnam par rtog pa
T02D1184:116a-33: med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi skyes
T02D1184:116a-34: bu de kho na'i rnal 'byor pa rnam par gnas
T02D1184:116a-35: pa spro ba'o // gang du zhe na /
T02D1184:116a-36: rigs lnga la ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga rnams la'o //
T02D1184:116a-38: rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1184:116a-39: ye shes lnga po rnams la mnyam pa'i ngo bos zhugs pa de nyid /
T02D1184:116a-40: rigs gcig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid de /
T02D1184:116a-41: de yang brtags pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1184:116a-43: gang phyir du ma yis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid spro ba dang /
T02D1184:116a-44: rigs gcig gi don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1184:116a-45: sdud par dbye ba tha dad pa'i bya ba mtshon
T02D1184:116a-46: mi bya / rtogs par mi bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:116a-48: yi ge lnga zhes pa ka kha ga gha nga /
T02D1184:116a-49: yi ge lnga po rnams la rnam par gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D1184:116a-50: ci ltar zhe na yi ge mnyam par ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:116a-51: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
T02D1184:116b-0: @116b phan tshun yi ge lnga rnams kyis bsdus pa
T02D1184:116b-1: gang yin pa yi ge gcig tu brtags pa rnam
T02D1184:116b-2: par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1184:116b-3: lnga nyid kyis gang nges pa de nyid ye shes
T02D1184:116b-4: lnga'o // gang gi he ru ka sbyor gyis //
T02D1184:116b-5: he ru ka sbyor ba de ni he ru ka sbyor te //
T02D1184:116b-6: de ni skyes bu rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1184:116b-9: yi ge gcig dang dum yis /
T02D1184:116b-10: yi ge gcig gis kyang gang gi phyir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa /
T02D1184:116b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbye ba sna tshogs
T02D1184:116b-12: brtag par mi bya zhing yi ge du ma nyid
T02D1184:116b-13: kyis kyang gang gi phyir dbye ba mtshon par mi
T02D1184:116b-14: bya ste / gang gi phyir tha dad dang tha
T02D1184:116b-15: dad med pa dag khyad par med pa nyid do
T02D1184:116b-16: bya ste / // de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas gang du gnas par bya zhe na /
T02D1184:116b-18: shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang //
T02D1184:116b-19: ma mo'i khyim dang bzhi mdo dang //
T02D1184:116b-20: yang na mtshan mo phyed dang ni //
T02D1184:116b-21: dben pa dang ni bas mtha' ru //
T02D1184:116b-22: sgom pa bzang bar brjod par bya //
T02D1184:116b-23: shing gcig ces pa gang la shing gzhan gyi grib
T02D1184:116b-24: ma mi 'byung ba'i shing de ni gdon mi za
T02D1184:116b-25: bar gnod sbyin lhag par gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D1184:116b-26: ro // de lhag par gnas pa'i gnas su gal te dogs pa med par gyur na /
T02D1184:116b-28: de'i de kho na'i spyod pa dang de'i 'bras bu yang 'byung ngo //
T02D1184:116b-29: dur khrod ces pa dur khrod kyis gzhir yang /
T02D1184:116b-30: yi dags lhag par gnas te /
T02D1184:116b-31: der yang 'dir dogs pa med pa nyid do //
T02D1184:116b-32: ma mo'i khyim zhes pa tsandi ka la sogs pa
T02D1184:116b-33: rab gtum gyi lha lhag par gnas par de 'jigs
T02D1184:116b-34: pa med pa'o ; / bzhi mdo zhes pa gang
T02D1184:116b-35: du lam bzhi gcig pa nyid de der yang lha
T02D1184:116b-37: dar ni brtson 'grus dman pas gnas par mi nus so //
T02D1184:116b-38: mtshan mo byed ces pa skye bo thams cad gnyid
T02D1184:116b-39: du song ba'i mtshan mo skad cig de la lha
T02D1184:116b-41: de la yang de dgos pa med pa'o //
T02D1184:116b-42: dben pa zhes pa ri'i phug la sogs pa ste /
T02D1184:116b-43: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:116b-45: 'jigs pa las nges par grol bas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1184:117a-0: bas mtha' zhes pa gzhan pa'i phyogs tha dad pa ches thag ring brgya mtsho'i @117a * //
T02D1184:117a-1: nang du gnas pa'i gling la sogs pa ste /
T02D1184:117a-2: der yang klu lhag par gnas pa nyid kyis 'jigs pa'i gnas nyid do //
T02D1184:117a-3: der yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1184:117a-4: cung zad drod ni thob pa na //
T02D1184:117a-5: gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pa //
T02D1184:117a-6: zhes pa gal te 'di lta bu'i spyod pa bya ba'i sgo yis byed 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02D1184:117a-7: cung zad drod ni thob pa na bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:117a-8: cung zad drod kyi sgras de kho na las lta stangs bzhi grub pa na'o //
T02D1184:117a-9: des dman pa dogs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:117a-10: gal te 'di lta bu'i spyod pa bya dka' bde ci'i don du byed ce na /
T02D1184:117a-13: 'dis ni spyod pa spyad par bya //
T02D1184:117a-14: gal te phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'grub pa
T02D1184:117a-15: dang thob par 'gyur ba'i 'dod pa yod pa gang
T02D1184:117a-16: gi phyir ni'i sgra de'i don zhes pa'i don te
T02D1184:117a-17: / 'dis ni spyod pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas par bya zhing spyad par bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:117a-19: shing gcig ces pa shing lta bur spro ba'i tshul
T02D1184:117a-20: gyis yal ga dang nye ba'i yal ga'i bdag nyid
T02D1184:117a-22: gcig ni lhan cig med pa sku rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:117a-23: dur khrod ces pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas n'a
T02D1184:117a-24: da'i phreng ba gnyis ka'i rang bzhin gsung rdo rje'o
T02D1184:117a-25: ; / ma mo'i khyim zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02D1184:117a-26: nye bar mtshon pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang ste /
T02D1184:117a-27: de dang tha dang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:117a-28: de rnams kyi khyim ni gnas thugs rdo rje ste der ro //
T02D1184:117a-29: bzhi mdo zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang ste der ro //
T02D1184:117a-31: mtshan mo las phyed gang gis mtshan mo dang tha dad du bya ba de ni nyin mo ste /
T02D1184:117a-32: nyin mo dang mtshan mo shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1184:117a-33: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid can ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la ste /
T02D1184:117a-34: mtshan mo phyed ces pa'i don ni 'di nyid mngon par gsal bar byed do //
T02D1184:117a-35: dben pa dang ni bas mtha' ru //
T02D1184:117a-36: zhes pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bo gang
T02D1184:117a-37: du me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes
T02D1184:117a-39: bas mtha' zhes pa spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu zab pa ste der ro //
T02D1184:117a-40: gnyis ka la yang gnyis ka yod pa'i phyir shing
T02D1184:117b-0: @117b gcig gis sku rdo rje mngon par gsal ba'i
T02D1184:117b-1: phyir rdo rje rigs kyi le'u'o //
T02D1184:117b-2: dur khrod kyis kyang gsung rdo rje mngon par gsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1184:117b-4: ma mo'i khyim gyis thugs rdo rje gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02D1184:117b-6: bzhi mdo yis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1184:117b-7: spyi bor rigs kyi dbang por 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:117b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i le'u'o //
T02D1184:117b-9: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dbyer med pas mtshan phyed ces pa ste /
T02D1184:117b-10: de nyid dkyil 'khor gnyis ka'i bdag nyid spro ba
T02D1184:117b-11: dang sdud pa'i ngo bos dkyil 'khor gnyis ka yang
T02D1184:117b-12: ngo zhes pa / de kho na'i le'u'o //
T02D1184:117b-13: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na'i rnal 'byor pa spyod pa byed nus pa'o //
T02D1184:117b-14: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa 'dis bya ba'i sgo yis
T02D1184:117b-15: spyod pa byed 'dod pa de ni cung zad drod
T02D1184:117b-16: thob par gyur pa na zhes pa lta stangs bzhi
T02D1184:117b-17: la sogs pa nus pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan
T02D1184:117b-18: pa'i phyir / de tshe spyod pa bya bar 'dod pas de dang sbyar ba nyid do //
T02D1184:117b-19: spyod pa nyid kyi don ci zhe na /
T02D1184:117b-21: 'grub 'gyur gal te 'di phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T02D1184:117b-22: 'dis ni spyod pa spyad par bya zhing gnas par bya'o //
T02D1184:117b-23: 'di ni de'i kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes brjod de /
T02D1184:117b-24: 'di dang bral bas yang dag pa'i dngos grub ma
T02D1184:117b-25: yin no zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa
T02D1184:117b-26: gsung rdo rje sngags kyi le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas
T02D1184:117b-28: 'dis ni spyod pa zhes pa gang gsungs pa de'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1184:117b-31: rigs lnga la sogs pa tha dad med par rtogs
T02D1184:117b-32: pa las shing gcig la sogs pa rnams su gnas
T02D1184:117b-34: de las kyang drod thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1184:117b-35: de las kyang kun du bzang po'i spyod pa bzod
T02D1184:117b-36: cing de las dngos grub kyi ched du dogs pa
T02D1184:117b-38: dngos grub kyang phyag rgya chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba nyid de /
T02D1184:117b-39: bden pa gnyis ka'i khyad par can phyag rgya rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1184:117b-40: de blangs te de dang lhan cig spyod pa bya ba ste /
T02D1184:117b-41: shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma //
T02D1184:117b-42: rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can //
T02D1184:117b-43: rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas //
T02D1184:118a-2: rang gis dbang bskur zhes pa rang gis dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1184:118a-3: chu la sogs pa'i cho gas dbang bskur ba shin tu rnam par dag par byas pa'o //
T02D1184:118a-5: snying rje can zhes pa gzhan gyi don la nye bar sbyor ba ste /
T02D1184:118a-6: snying rje med na mi 'grub pas //
T02D1184:118a-8: rdo rje'i bu mo zhes pa /
T02D1184:118a-9: rdo rje'i rigs lo bcu drug ma ste /
T02D1184:118a-10: 'di lta bu 'di khyer zhing gzung nas spyod pa byas te /
T02D1184:118a-11: mchog gi spyod pa bya'o zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1184:118a-12: rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos med na //
T02D1184:118a-13: rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya //
T02D1184:118a-14: rang 'dod lha zhes pa rang gi 'dod pa dang mngon par 'dod pa'i lha de'i rigs kyis te /
T02D1184:118a-15: rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che //
T02D1184:118a-16: de yi lha ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1184:118a-17: ces pa la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs de yis kyang zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:118a-18: gal te de yang ma rnyed na de'i tshe /
T02D1184:118a-19: yang na zhes pa phyogs gzhan te gzhan gyi rigs byung ba tha dad pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02D1184:118a-20: byang chub sa bon btab pa yis //
T02D1184:118a-21: yang dag sbyangs pa zhes pa byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:118a-22: de'i sa bon ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu las te /

T02D1184:125b-27: blo rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jug pa kho

T02D1184:126a-34: bsam gtan gyi sgras lha'i bsam pa bskyed pa'i bya ba ste /

T02D1184:126a-37: sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dka' thub 'das //

T02D1184:126b-37: te / de yang sngon du thog mar dang por

T02D1184:126b-40: / brgya byin lta bu zhes pa spro ba'i bdag nyid can te /

T02D1184:126b-44: ba de bzhin du de yang seng ge'i gzugs kyis
T02D1184:126b-45: thams cad du dogs pa med par rgyu bar bya

T02D1184:127a-6: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //

T02D1184:127a-16: rnal 'byor bsrung ba la rjes su chags pa'o //
T02D1184:127a-17: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1184:127a-18: de'i phyir btung ba gzhan dang nyams su myong ba

T02D1184:127a-22: de btung bar bya ste gnyis su med pa rtogs
T02D1184:127a-23: pas don dam pa'i bden pa nyid rtag tu bar

T02D1184:127a-26: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //

T02D1184:127a-31: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor btung dga' gnyis ka

T02D1184:127a-34: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni btung ba gzhan te /
T02D1184:127a-35: gzhan ni lhan cig med pa gcig pu'o //
T02D1184:127a-36: de btung ba ni zos pa gnyis su med par rtogs pa ste /
T02D1184:127a-37: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:127a-38: ma dag pa dag pa med do zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:127a-39: thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi
T02D1184:127a-40: dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rnam pa thams
T02D1184:127a-41: cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1184:127a-42: par gsungs so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

T02D1184:127a-44: 'byor gyi spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o //

T02D1184:127b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1184:127b-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rdo rje gsum mo //
T02D1184:127b-3: kye'i rdo rje ni shes rab dang thabs dbyer med
T02D1184:127b-4: pa'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

T02D1184:127b-6: nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa

T02D1184:127b-11: kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa las le'u
T02D1184:127b-13: / lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang //
T02D1184:127b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa mdor bstan pa de la
T02D1184:127b-15: brda chen ni spyod pa'i le'u'i bar ma chad par
T02D1184:127b-17: spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa nges pa med pas gnas pa'i phyir /

T02D1184:127b-26: de la mnyes par 'gyur te de'i phyir de rnams dang 'dus pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:127b-28: de nas tstsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:127b-29: de nas zhes pa spyod pa'i le'u'i bar ma chad
T02D1184:127b-30: pa kho nar rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor ma'i brda
T02D1184:127b-31: bstan pa mtshon par bya ba'i phyir tstsho ma'i sgras
T02D1184:127b-32: tstsho ma'i brda'o // de'i le'u rab tu brtan par bya'o //
T02D1184:127b-33: gang gis spun dang sring mor yang //
T02D1184:127b-34: the tshom med par shes bya ba //

T02D1184:134b-13: dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod dbyer med pa'i
T02D1184:134b-14: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams rab
T02D1184:134b-15: tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa bcu rnams dang
T02D1184:134b-16: rim pa ji lta bar sbyar bar bya'o zhes pas

T02D1184:134b-18: 'chang gnyis so zhes brjod bya gzhan gyis min /
T02D1184:134b-19: tha dad pa rnams kyis min te sangs rgyas dang
T02D1184:134b-20: rdo rje 'chang gi tha dad med pa nyid sa

T02D1184:134b-22: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa sa bcu
T02D1184:134b-23: rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang yul
T02D1184:134b-24: rnam par dag bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D1184:134b-25: dur khrod ni sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par shes par dag par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1184:134b-26: nye ba'i dur khrod ni rdo rje 'chang gi sa
T02D1184:134b-27: bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'i rnam
T02D1184:134b-28: pa las 'das par blta bar bya'o //

T02D1184:134b-30: rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi rdo rje gsum dbyer med
T02D1184:134b-31: pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas
T02D1184:134b-32: dang rdo rje 'chang thams cad sa bcu'i dbang phyug
T02D1184:134b-34: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs
T02D1184:134b-35: par byang chub ba la dbye ba 'ga' yang med
T02D1184:134b-36: do zhes pa'o // de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:134b-37: sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D1184:134b-38: dam tshig sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D1184:134b-39: rdo rje rigs kyi le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1184:134b-40: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa bcu ni dbang po dang yul rnams so //
T02D1184:134b-41: dur khrod ni n'a da'i bdag nyid can gyi sems so //
T02D1184:134b-42: nye ba'i dur khrod ni de las 'das pa'o zhes pa'o //

T02D1184:135a-8: gnas ni kolla gi ri nyid //
T02D1184:135a-9: de bzhin k'a ma r'u pa nyid //
T02D1184:135a-10: ces pa bzhi ni gnas kyi dbye ba'o //

T02D1184:135a-18: zhes pa bzhi ni zhing gi dbye ba'o //

T02D1184:135a-23: zhes pa bzhi ni nye ba'i zhing gi dbye ba'o //
T02D1184:135a-24: tshando ha ri ke la ni //

T02D1184:135a-26: zhes pa ha ri ke la'i khyad par ro //
T02D1184:135a-28: de bzhin soo r'ashta nyid do //
T02D1184:135a-29: zhes pa bzhi ni tshando ha'i dbye ba'o //

T02D1184:135a-35: zhes pa gsum ni nye ba'i tshando ta'i dbye ba'o //
T02D1184:135a-36: 'thung gcong grong gi mthar gnas pa //

T02D1184:135a-38: grong khyer gyi yang 'thung gcod do //
T02D1184:135a-39: zhes pa grong khyer gyi mtha'i sa gzhi'o //

T02D1184:135a-43: zhes pa ri tra la sogs pa rnams dang nye ba'i sa gzhi yang ste /

T02D1184:135a-50: mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya //

T02D1184:135b-0: zhes @135b ba dur khrod kyis gzhi'o //

T02D1184:135b-4: zhes pa bzhi ni dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod kyi dbye ba'o //

T02D1184:135b-12: phyag rgya dang ldan pa rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:135b-14: rdo rje 'chang 'di'i mthar thug pa kho na zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1184:135b-30: gnas dag gi dbye ba rnam pa bdun no //

T02D1184:136a-6: bu'i 'gram zhes pa la sogs pa'i bar gnas lnga

T02D1184:136a-9: rnams so // te / gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1184:136a-10: po rnams su shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin
T02D1184:136a-11: gyi rtsa'i 'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo

T02D1184:136a-43: yi dags phyogs la'ang bcu bzhi pa //

T02D1184:136b-1: lan bdun pa skye ba bdun te /
T02D1184:136b-3: de ltar gyur pa'i skyes bu nyi ma gang rnams
T02D1184:136b-4: la bza' bar bya ba de rnams nyi ma ste
T02D1184:136b-5: / yi dags phyogs la gang zhig bcu bzhi pa de nyid dang /
T02D1184:136b-6: phyogs la gang zhig brgyad pa de nyid la'o //
T02D1184:136b-8: nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya //
T02D1184:136b-9: zhes pa nyin par ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1184:136b-10: de nyid rab bshad bya phul du byung bas tha snyad du bya'o //
T02D1184:136b-12: rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga ste /

T02D1184:136b-18: de nyid ci ltar zhe na /
T02D1184:136b-21: 'di rnams la rnal 'byor ma yod pa'i phyir rnal 'byor ma ste /
T02D1184:136b-22: de rnams kyi khyad par rtogs pa /
T02D1184:136b-23: kye'i rdo rje gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1184:136b-32: rgyu dang byed pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //

T02D1184:136b-43: don to // yi dags phyogs la /

T02D1184:137a-10: a'am rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1184:137a-11: mya'm rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1184:137a-12: mya'm rdo rje gsum gsum mo //

T02D1184:137a-26: rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor de la'o //
T02D1184:137a-27: rgyal mtshan ni mtshan ma ste chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //

T02D1184:137a-29: bsnun pa ni cung zad kyang med pa'o //

T02D1184:137b-4: snying rje bskyed nas 'bad pa yis //

T02D1184:137b-6: zhes pa de'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1184:137b-7: dbyangs pa dang g-yul du gsad pa ni kha na ma tho ba med pa ste /
T02D1184:137b-8: dngos grub kyi don du de bza' bar bya'o //

T02D1184:137b-12: nges par gsad nas bza' bar bya ste ;

T02D1184:137b-17: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgrub pa'i

T02D1184:137b-27: pa dang rnal 'byor ma gang yin pa rnams kyang

T02D1184:144a-41: byin za zhes pa rang bzhin med par byed pa'i phyir thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:144a-42: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa ni rlung chen ste /
T02D1184:144b-0: yang dag @144b pa'i ye shes so //

T02D1184:144b-12: 'khor lo gang zhig chos 'byung las skyes pa de ni /
T02D1184:144b-14: de khyad par ci zhe na /

T02D1184:144b-16: dag pa zhes pa yongs su dag pa ste /
T02D1184:144b-17: nang gi rim pa dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1184:144b-18: phyi'i rim pa skyon med pa'o //

T02D1184:144b-23: phyir nang dang bral ba 'dra ba ste /
T02D1184:144b-24: de dang bral ba'i phyir skyon med lha'i bdag nyid

T02D1184:144b-26: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //

T02D1184:145a-7: phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan //

T02D1184:145a-21: rim pa 'dis yongs su rdzogs pa 'dis ni //

T02D1184:145a-27: thug par bsdus pas rab tu grags pa yongs su

T02D1184:145a-29: gnyis bsdus pa yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i
T02D1184:145a-30: zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bar du gnas

T02D1184:145a-39: bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan //

T02D1184:145b-0: yang dag par rig @145b pa'i rang bzhin thugs rdo rje /

T02D1184:146b-28: zla ba'i gzugs khu ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //

T02D1184:146b-34: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gnyis po

T02D1184:147a-0: byang chub kyi sems dang 'od gsal ba dag dbyer med @147a * //

T02D1184:147b-22: zhes pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag
T02D1184:147b-23: pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1184:147b-25: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cu
T02D1184:147b-26: dang ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'i don
T02D1184:147b-28: bdag med ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma bco
T02D1184:147b-29: lnga rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i zla
T02D1184:147b-30: ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon dang gsum tha
T02D1184:147b-31: dad med pa nyid dang de dag las byung ba
T02D1184:147b-32: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1184:147b-33: rang bzhin me long lta bu la sogs pa ye
T02D1184:147b-35: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa kho na rdo rje 'chang po zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:147b-37: a'a li k'a li mnyam rtogs so //
T02D1184:147b-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan yin te //
T02D1184:147b-39: zhes pa a'a li shes rab po //
T02D1184:147b-41: gnyis ka mnyam rtogs pa ni mnyam pa'i ye shes te tha dad med par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1184:147b-43: go rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1184:148a-0: go'i sgras go dbang po rnams te me long lta @148a * //
T02D1184:148a-1: bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyis spro ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:148a-2: rdo rje zhes pa mi phyed pa nyid kyis sdud pa'i rang bzhin can bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:148a-3: 'das ni go rdo rje shes rab dang thabs dbyer
T02D1184:148a-4: med pa gang yin pa sems dpa'i srid pa gsum
T02D1184:148a-6: de ni go rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1184:148a-7: de'i gdan ni rdo rje 'chang gi gdan te /
T02D1184:148a-8: 'di rnams kyi gzhi nyid kyis khyab pa'o //
T02D1184:148a-10: 'gyur med las byung gong bu ni //
T02D1184:148a-11: h'um de phat yig 'dod min nyid //
T02D1184:148a-12: 'gyur med kyi sgras a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis so //
T02D1184:148a-13: de las byung ba na de las skyes pa ste /
T02D1184:148a-14: gong bu ni gang gi sku de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1184:148a-15: 'gyur med las byung gong gu de ni h'um yig kho na ste //
T02D1184:148a-16: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:148a-17: phat yig tha dad pa'i bya ba yang 'dod min nyid de /
T02D1184:148a-18: h'um yig gi sa bon nyid las bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang yin zhing /
T02D1184:148a-19: 'di'i mtshan ma yang rdo rje 'chang 'di nyid de /
T02D1184:148a-20: sa bon gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid kyis /
T02D1184:148a-21: rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer med pa'ang bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:148a-22: yang na 'gyur med kyi sgras 'dzag pa med cing g-yo ba med pa'i phyir 'gyur med do //
T02D1184:148a-23: de yang byung ba skyes pa 'di de kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:148a-24: de'i gong bu ni sku ste /
T02D1184:148a-25: kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid gong bur byas pa don dam pa'i bden pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1184:148a-29: h'um ste zhes pa ha thabs dang au shes rab
T02D1184:148a-30: dang gnyis ka dbyer med pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D1184:148a-31: zla tshes dang / de yang thig le stong ba nyid kyis rang bzhin med pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1184:148a-32: phat shes rab bdag med ma de la byed pa
T02D1184:148a-33: dang bya ba kun du rtog pa 'dod min nyid
T02D1184:148a-34: ces pa mi 'dod pa kho na ste /
T02D1184:148a-35: sgro ma btags pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:148a-36: yang na 'gyur med las byung gong bu g-yo ba
T02D1184:148a-37: med pa'i ngo bor byung ba'i gong bu'i byed pa
T02D1184:148a-38: dang / bya ba rdo rje'i lte bang nang du
T02D1184:148a-39: gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems g-yo ba med pa
T02D1184:148a-40: nyid kyi rgyu ci zhe na /
T02D1184:148a-42: de'i phyir yang de la phat tha dad pa 'dod
T02D1184:148a-43: min nyid ces pa kho na'i don la nyid kyi
T02D1184:148a-44: sgra ste / sbyor ba bya ba kho na'o zhes pa'o /
T02D1184:148b-2: de rnams 'dor ba'i phyir ra ste /
T02D1184:148b-4: byung ba ni de ltar gyur pa chags pa'i mtshan nyid 'dod chags chen po ste /
T02D1184:148b-5: gong bu ni dbang po la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1184:148b-6: gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir gong bu lta
T02D1184:148b-7: bu'o // 'dod chags chen po de ni phat tha
T02D1184:148b-8: dad pa chags pa las rnam par grol ba ste
T02D1184:148b-9: bu'o // / 'dod min nyid ces pa chags pa
T02D1184:148b-10: thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir de la
T02D1184:148b-11: 'dod pa'i bya ba med pa kho na'o //
T02D1184:148b-14: dga' ba la sogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i mthar thug pa bzhi pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:148b-18: de'i phyir byung ba'i gong bu'o //
T02D1184:148b-19: de'i h'um bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:148b-20: de nyid kyi phyir phat yig mi 'dod pa kho na'o //
T02D1184:148b-21: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig gi dkyil
T02D1184:148b-22: 'khor dag gnyis su med pa mdor bstan nas rgyas
T02D1184:148b-23: par bshad pas rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa /
T02D1184:148b-24: sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang dag byung //
T02D1184:148b-25: dkyil 'khor dbang po rnam par bsgom //
T02D1184:148b-26: zhes pa sems dpa'i sgras a'a li k'a li n'a
T02D1184:148b-27: da'i phreng ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid can zla ba
T02D1184:148b-28: dang / nyi ma dang bar du gnas pa'i sa bon rnams srid pa gsum yin la /
T02D1184:148b-29: de dag gcig pa nyid ni sems dpa'o //
T02D1184:148b-30: de las de'i bdag nyid kyis shin tu rnam par
T02D1184:148b-31: dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gzugs brnyan
T02D1184:148b-32: chu'i zla ba lta bur bden pa dang mi bden
T02D1184:148b-33: pa rnam par dpyad pa las 'das pa ni /
T02D1184:148b-35: de ni yang dag par byung ba ste /
T02D1184:148b-36: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1184:148b-37: gtso bor rnam par bsgom zhing rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1184:148b-38: pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par 'jug pa rdzogs par bya'o
T02D1184:148b-40: sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang dag byung ba gang yin
T02D1184:148b-41: pa de nyid dkyil 'khor du ye shes lnga dbyer
T02D1184:148b-42: med pa'i snying po len pa la /
T02D1184:148b-43: rnam par bsgom zhing bde ba lhan cig skyes pa
T02D1184:148b-44: bsgom pa rnam par gsal bar goms par bya ste
T02D1184:148b-45: / shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:149a-1: dbang po khyad par ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1184:149a-3: sngar bzhin zhal dang mtshan ma sogs //
T02D1184:149a-4: zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od //
T02D1184:149a-5: sngar bzhin zhas pa sngar gyi phyag bzhi pa dang /
T02D1184:149a-7: phyag bcu drug pa rnams bzhin te /
T02D1184:149a-8: le'u gnyis par zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1184:149a-9: zhabs bzhi pa zhes pa la sogs pa gang gsungs pa dang /
T02D1184:149a-10: le'u gsum par phyag bzhi pa bdud bzhi las rgyal
T02D1184:149a-11: ba rnam par dag pa ste zhes pa la sogs
T02D1184:149a-12: pa dang / de bzhin du phyag drug pa zhal
T02D1184:149a-13: gsum pa zhes pa la sogs pa gang yin pa'o
T02D1184:149a-14: pa dang / // de ltar gyur pa'i zhal dang mtshan ma la sogs pa rnams te ;
T02D1184:149a-15: t'anda ba la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang mtshan ma'o //
T02D1184:149a-16: 'on kyang zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od //
T02D1184:149a-17: sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang dag byung ba'i rgyu rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D1184:149a-18: rgyu rdo rje 'chang gi rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku mdog kyang dkar po yin la /
T02D1184:149a-19: 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang gi sku mdog nag po nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:149a-21: sngar bzhin zhes pa ji ltar sngar chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ro'i steng du /
T02D1184:149a-22: zla ba dang nyi ma dang bar du gnas pa'i sa bon rnams so //
T02D1184:149a-23: de bzhin du zhal ni brjod pa'i phyir zhal te /
T02D1184:149a-24: n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis so //
T02D1184:149a-25: mtshan ma ni sa bon te /
T02D1184:149a-26: zhal dang mtshan ma gsum po 'di nyid sogs pa ste /
T02D1184:149a-28: rgyu de rnams kyis gang zhig zla ba byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1184:149a-30: gnyis ka mthar thug pa'i phyir zla ba chu shel lo //
T02D1184:149a-32: nor bu lta bur gzugs sna tshogs pa dang nor
T02D1184:149a-33: bu 'od gsal ba de ni zla ba dang chu
T02D1184:149a-35: de ni kha sbyor du sdud pa gsungs pa /
T02D1184:149a-36: de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid //
T02D1184:149a-37: de ltar rim pas me long lta bu la sogs
T02D1184:149a-38: pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin
T02D1184:149a-39: gshegs pa dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad rdzogs pa
T02D1184:149a-41: gang ae wam nyid mkha' 'gro ma thams cad rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1184:149a-42: ae wam zhes pa 'di nyid kyi don rgyas par
T02D1184:149a-43: ston pa shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin las
T02D1184:149a-44: / ae yig gis shes rab dang /
T02D1184:149a-46: rang bzhin las zhes pa 'dis shes rab de nyid
T02D1184:149b-0: a'a li zhes brjod cing thabs de @149b nyid k'a
T02D1184:149b-4: 'dis rab dbye las ae yig dang /
T02D1184:149b-5: wam yig dag la shes rab dang thabs dgong pa
T02D1184:149b-6: dag las kyang a'a li dang k'a li dag go
T02D1184:149b-7: // de dag las kyang zla ba dang nyi ma dag ste /
T02D1184:149b-8: de'i phyir 'dis khyad par du phye zhing khyad par du 'phags pa phul du byung ba'o //
T02D1184:149b-10: ae wam thams cad rdzogs pa nyid //
T02D1184:149b-11: ces pa ae wam ni gang zhig byang chub kyi
T02D1184:149b-12: sems stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o
T02D1184:149b-14: thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang dang /
T02D1184:149b-15: aa bdag med ma'o zhes pa /
T02D1184:149b-16: thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang dbyer med pa'i bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:149b-17: de nyid ni rdzogs pa ste /
T02D1184:149b-18: lhag ma med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:149b-19: gang gi phyir gang la a'a: rnam par bcad pa'i mtha' can no //
T02D1184:149b-20: de nyid kyi phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1184:149b-21: bzhin las zhes pa shes rab bdag med ma dang
T02D1184:149b-23: gnyis ka'i rang bzhin las so //
T02D1184:149b-24: gnyis ka yang a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng
T02D1184:149b-25: ba gnyis te de dag dbyer med pa las cha
T02D1184:149b-27: de'i phyir zla ba byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1184:149b-28: nyi ma cha dang bral ba bde ba chen po'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:149b-29: gnyis kyi rab dbye las rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1184:149b-30: khyad par du rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bzhi pa rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:149b-31: ae wam zhes pa dga' ba'o //
T02D1184:149b-32: shes rab thabs zhes pa mchog dga'o //
T02D1184:149b-33: a'a li k'a li zhes pa khyad par gyi dga' ba'o //
T02D1184:149b-34: zla ba dang nyi ma'i rab dbye las zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bzhi pa'o //
T02D1184:149b-35: 'dis ni 'di las dkar mo la sogs te /
T02D1184:149b-36: yi ge'i dbye ba so so gzhan //
T02D1184:149b-37: rgyu 'di nyid las dkar mo la sogs pa'i phyi'i
T02D1184:149b-38: rim pa la gnas pa gzugs la sogs pa'i yul
T02D1184:149b-39: rnam par dag pa mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo la
T02D1184:149b-40: sogs pa kha dog nag mo la sogs pa rnams
T02D1184:149b-41: kyis rab tu dbye ba tha dad pa so so
T02D1184:149b-43: gang gi phyir mkha' 'gro ma rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1184:149b-44: yi ge'i dbye ba zhes pa sa bon gyi dbye ba ste /
T02D1184:149b-45: gang gi phyir so so gzhan zhes pa mkha' 'gro
T02D1184:149b-46: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon so so
T02D1184:149b-47: tha dad pa las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:150a-0: @150a * // yang na dkar mo la sogs 'gyur //
T02D1184:150a-1: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1184:150a-2: 'di nyid mchog rmad du byung ba'o //
T02D1184:150a-3: yi ge rnams kyi dbye ba med pa ni sdud pa ste /
T02D1184:150a-4: de nyid so so zhes pa spro ba'o //
T02D1184:150a-5: spro ba dang sdud pa'i bdag nyid kyis bden pa
T02D1184:150a-6: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can kho na dkyil 'khor gnyis
T02D1184:150a-8: de nyid mngon par gsal bar mdzad pa re zhig
T02D1184:150a-9: nang gi rim pa la rnal 'byor ma lnga rnam
T02D1184:150a-11: gang zhig bdag gi dbang du byas pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1184:150a-12: nang gi rim pa de la'o //
T02D1184:150a-13: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa ste /
T02D1184:150a-14: phyi nas phyi'i rim pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:150a-15: gnas zhes pa gcig gi tshig / tha dad pa med pa las so //
T02D1184:150a-16: rnam pa ni nges pa'i don te /
T02D1184:150a-17: rnal 'byor ma lnga zhes pa me long lta bu
T02D1184:150a-18: la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rnal
T02D1184:150a-20: de rnams ci ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D1184:150a-22: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1184:150a-23: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom //
T02D1184:150a-28: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1184:150a-30: rnal 'byor rig pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rtogs pa ste /
T02D1184:150a-31: rtag tu zhes pa bar ma chad pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1184:150a-33: nang gi rim pa zhes pa bdag nyid la lhag par 'khyud cing /
T02D1184:150a-35: gang zhig rim pa kha sbyor de la re zhig
T02D1184:150a-36: gnas pa rlabs dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can te
T02D1184:150a-38: / de khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D1184:150a-39: rnal 'byor ma lnga rnal 'byor ma me long lta
T02D1184:150a-40: bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o
T02D1184:150a-41: // 'dis ni gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can bdag med ma nyid mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1184:150a-42: de nyid kyi phyir phung po lnga gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02D1184:150a-43: de rnams kyi rang bzhin me long lta bu la
T02D1184:150a-44: sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can rnam par
T02D1184:150a-45: snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1184:150a-46: rnams so // rang bzhin de yis bsgom zhing snyoms par 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1184:150a-47: rnal 'byor rig pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa rtogs pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:150b-0: rtag tu zhes pa bar mchad pa nyid @150b kyis so //
T02D1184:150b-1: nang gi rim par gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma lnga po nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1184:150b-2: dbang por rdo rje shar gyi 'dab ma la rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1184:150b-3: gshin rjer lho'i 'dab ma la dkar mo'o //
T02D1184:150b-4: chu ru nub kyi 'dab ma la chu'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1184:150b-5: lus ngan du byang gi 'dab ma la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1184:150b-6: dbus su dbus kyi ze 'bru la bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1184:150b-8: dbang por rdo rje zhes pa gzugs kyi phung po'i
T02D1184:150b-9: rdo rje ma zhes pa'i gsung las snang ba'i mtshan
T02D1184:150b-11: gshin rje dkar zhes pa tshor ba'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dkar mo ste /
T02D1184:150b-12: tshor ba la ni dkar mor brjod //
T02D1184:150b-13: zhes pa'i gsung las yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:150b-14: chu ru chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1184:150b-17: zhes pa'i gsung las mngon par brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:150b-18: lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1184:150b-19: zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyis 'du byed kyi phung po ste /
T02D1184:150b-20: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid
T02D1184:150b-21: kyis de rdo rje 'chang dang mkha' 'gro ma yang
T02D1184:150b-22: yin pa'i phyir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1184:150b-25: de 'gro ba'i phyir zhes pa'i nges tshig gis mkha'
T02D1184:150b-26: 'gro ma rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa rdo rje
T02D1184:150b-28: dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1184:150b-29: zhes pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa /
T02D1184:150b-30: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis de ni dbus su gnas pa ste /
T02D1184:150b-31: de bdag dang bdag gi ba'i 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:150b-32: rnal 'byor ma bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1184:150b-33: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa
T02D1184:150b-34: nyid kyis phyi'i rim par gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1184:150b-37: dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma //
T02D1184:150b-39: ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo //
T02D1184:150b-40: brgyad pa dombi n'i ru brjod //
T02D1184:150b-41: phyi'i rim pa'i shar gyi 'dab ma la goo r'i'o //
T02D1184:150b-43: nub kyi 'dab ma la be t'a li'o //
T02D1184:150b-44: byang gi 'dab ma la ghasma r'i'o //
T02D1184:150b-45: dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la pukka s'i'o //
T02D1184:150b-46: me'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma la sha ba r'i'o //
T02D1184:151a-1: bral gyi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la tsanda l'i'o //
T02D1184:151a-2: rlung gi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dombi n'i'o //
T02D1184:151a-3: 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid //
T02D1184:151a-4: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod //
T02D1184:151a-5: 'og gi sgras padma gnyis kyi 'dab ma'i rtse mo
T02D1184:151a-6: dang rtsa ba dag gi 'og tu gnas pa'i phyir
T02D1184:151a-8: de bzhin du steng du mkha' spyod ma'o //
T02D1184:151a-9: srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1184:151a-10: 'di dag gnas so snying rje che //
T02D1184:151a-11: sa spyod ma dang mkha' spyod ma'i mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni srid pa dang /
T02D1184:151a-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnas te /

T02D1184:189a-0: gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur te @189a *
T02D1184:189a-2: lta stangs sgrub pa na yang 'khrul par mi bya'o //
T02D1184:189a-3: gang gi phyir dngos grub 'di yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
T02D1184:189a-4: de kho na rtogs pa'i mngon par zhen pa yang mngon par zhen pa med pa kho na'o //
T02D1184:189a-5: lta stangs 'di rnams kyang sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul te /
T02D1184:189a-7: gang gi phyir dman pa dang /
T02D1184:189a-8: bar ma dang mchog gi sems can gzhug pa'i phyir te /
T02D1184:189a-10: lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D1184:189a-11: mkhas pas sems can gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1184:189a-12: lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas sems can rnams yang
T02D1184:189a-13: dag pa'i lam la rab tu gzhug pa'i rgyu'i phyir
T02D1184:189a-16: zla drug ces pa drug gi sgras drug pa rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1184:189a-17: drug gi ngo bos m'a grangs dang 'jal bar byed pa ste drug gzhal lo //
T02D1184:189a-18: de 'jug cing sdud pa'i phyir zla drug ste /
T02D1184:189a-19: drug pa rdo rje 'chang med par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1184:189a-22: goms pa'i sbyor ba yis zhes pa spyor ba ni ldan pa dang 'du ba ste /
T02D1184:189a-23: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1184:189a-24: goms pa ni rtag tu byed pa ste /
T02D1184:189a-25: goms pa rtag tu byed pas sbyor ba'o //
T02D1184:189a-26: des 'grub 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med do //
T02D1184:189a-27: de nyid kyi phyir 'di la 'khrul pa med de /
T02D1184:189a-28: rnam par rtog pa yang 'di la yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1184:189a-29: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa drug gi yon tan rnams te /
T02D1184:189a-30: de bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa las 'das pa'o //
T02D1184:189a-31: de nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1184:189a-32: bya ba ni 'bras bu yin la /
T02D1184:189a-33: 'bras bu ni rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:189a-35: aa: yig la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i
T02D1184:189a-36: rang bzhin rnam par bcad pa'i mtha' can zhes pa'o
T02D1184:189a-37: // lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D1184:189a-38: zhes pa ye shes bzhi grub pa na /

T02D1184:189a-42: aa pa gnyis ka dbyer med pa nges par gzhug cing khyab par bya ste /
T02D1184:189a-43: gnyis ka dbyer med par spro ba nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1184:189a-44: mkhas ba zhes pa ye shes gcig pu'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:189a-45: gal te lta stangs bzhi la lta stangs gsum ni sems can 'jug pa la don yod kyi /
T02D1184:189b-0: gsad pa'i lta stangs ni re zhig @189b sems can 'jug pa la ring bar gyur te /
T02D1184:189b-1: sems can la gnod pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D1184:189b-4: gzhan du dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1184:189b-5: gsad pa la ni 'bras bu ci yang med kyi
T02D1184:189b-6: khyad par du skyon nyid nye bar skye bar 'gyur
T02D1184:189b-7: te // dam tshig nyams pa zhes pa sangs rgyas
T02D1184:189b-8: dang byang chub sems dpa'i gsung rab la goms par
T02D1184:189b-10: brdzun smra ba la sogs pa gzhan yang 'gog par
T02D1184:189b-11: byed na gsod pa ni mchog tu yang ngo zhe
T02D1184:189b-13: sems can slu ba spangs nas ni //
T02D1184:189b-14: bya ba ma yin thams cad bya //
T02D1184:189b-15: srog bcad pas thams cad du mi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:189b-16: brdzun la sogs pa rnams la thams cad du mi
T02D1184:189b-17: dge ba med pa'i phyir sems can la gnod pa
T02D1184:189b-18: mi dge bas skyon cing 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1184:189b-20: sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1184:189b-21: phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1184:189b-22: zhes pa gang gi phyir sems can re re la
T02D1184:189b-23: gnod pa nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1184:189b-24: nyams so zhes pa'i don no //
