T02D1184:189b-26: de ltar na 'di goms par byed pa de ci'i don du gsungs she na /
T02D1184:189b-27: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'grub pa la thams cad goms par bya ba kho na'o //
T02D1184:189b-28: 'on kyang dor ba nyid kyis rnam par gnas par bya'o zhes dgongs te /
T02D1184:189b-29: ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pa des /
T02D1184:189b-30: nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa la yang bslab pa nyid de /
T02D1184:189b-31: ci de'i sems nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par
T02D1184:189b-32: bya'o snyam pa ni ma yin te spangs pa'i phyir
T02D1184:189b-33: ro // de nyid kyi phyir rlon pa'i shing la goms par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:189b-34: yang na gang gsad par gsungs pa gang yin pa
T02D1184:189b-35: de sems can la gnod pa'i blos bya ba ma
T02D1184:189b-36: yin gyi 'on kyang phan pa'i bsam pa kho nas
T02D1184:189b-37: bya'o // de lta mod kyi dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la /
T02D1184:189b-38: gnod pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa dmyal par 'gro bar
T02D1184:189b-39: 'gyur ba'i sems can de kho na rtogs pas snying
T02D1184:189b-40: rje'i bsam pa nyid dang de la phan pa'i blos
T02D1184:189b-41: mi bskyod pa'i rigs la bsad nas drang bar bya
T02D1184:189b-42: ba yin gyi gzhan khro bas zil gyis mnan pa
T02D1184:189b-43: la sogs pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i bsam pas ma
T02D1184:189b-44: yin no zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:190a-1: pa dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa
T02D1184:190a-2: rnams gsad pa las 'bras bu yang dag pa'i ye
T02D1184:190a-4: de nyid kyi phyir 'dus pa'i khyad par te /
T02D1184:190a-5: 'dus pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lha rnams 'dus pa ste /
T02D1184:190a-6: 'di la lha rnams 'dus pa'i phyir 'dus pa'o //
T02D1184:190a-7: de'i khyad par ni lha rnams 'dus pa'i rnam par
T02D1184:190a-8: rtog pa yang de la med do zhes pa ste
T02D1184:190a-9: / de nyid kyi phyir mchog rmad du byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1184:190a-10: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
T02D1184:190a-12: bya ba ma yin thams cad bya //
T02D1184:190a-13: thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:190a-16: 'di gnyis ka dbyer med pa ni bya ba ste /
T02D1184:190a-18: gang gi phyir gang las sems can slu ba ni
T02D1184:190a-19: srid pa gsum gcig pa nyid gang zhig yongs su
T02D1184:190a-20: spong ba'o // 'di nyid ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1184:190a-22: bya ba spangs nas bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1184:190a-23: bya ba de yongs su spangs nas zhes pa bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:190a-25: sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1184:190a-26: phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1184:190a-27: sems can gnod pa'i sgras srid pa gsum gcig pa
T02D1184:190a-28: nyid rtogs pa med par rtogs pas phyag rgya'i dngos
T02D1184:190a-29: grub / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste /
T02D1184:190a-30: de yang rnyed mi 'gyur thob pa'i yul ma yin
T02D1184:190a-31: pa nyid las phyag rgya 'grub pa'i phyir zhes pa'i
T02D1184:190a-32: don no // de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1184:190a-33: de la dam tshig bza' bya ba //
T02D1184:190a-34: na dang ha dang ga dang po //
T02D1184:190a-35: mtha' yi shva dang dang po'i shva //
T02D1184:190a-36: bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza' //
T02D1184:190a-37: kye yi rdo rjer dngos grub rgyus //
T02D1184:190a-38: lnga tshan gnyis po 'di ni dam tshig ste lha'i 'dus pa'o //
T02D1184:190a-39: na dang po la sogs pa ni yul rnams so //
T02D1184:190a-40: bdud rtsi lnga ni dbang po rnams te /
T02D1184:190a-41: dam tshig gnyis po de bza' zhing ro mnyam par bya'o //
T02D1184:190a-43: ro mnyam pa'i rang bzhin kho na ste /
T02D1184:190a-44: gang gi phyir rang bzhin rnam bar dag pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:190a-46: dngos grub kyi rgyus phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid kyis so //
T02D1184:190a-48: kye'i rdo rjer gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i ye shes su gyur pa na zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:190a-49: kun rdzob kyi phyir ni dam tshig ces pa dam tshig bcu ste /
T02D1184:190b-0: na dang po zhes pa dam tshig @190b gang gi dang po na yig yod pa de ni /
T02D1184:190b-2: de ni rgyal po s'a li'o //
T02D1184:190b-3: ha dang po zhes pa gang gi dang po ha yig yod pa de ni ha dang po ste /
T02D1184:190b-4: glang po che yin pa de'i s'a li'o //
T02D1184:190b-5: de bzhin du ga dang po zhes pa ba lang ste de'i 'o //
T02D1184:190b-6: mtha' yi shva zhes ba rta'i'o //
T02D1184:190b-7: dang po'i shva zhes pa khyi'i'o //
T02D1184:190b-8: bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1184:190b-9: kye'i rdo rjer zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i ye she su gyur pa na'o //
T02D1184:190b-10: na dang po khyad par rnyed na zos pas 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1184:190b-11: de nas lan bdun pa mtshon bya //
T02D1184:190b-12: kye yi rdo rjer gsungs mtshan nyid //
T02D1184:190b-14: dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa'o //
T02D1184:190b-15: lan bdun pa'i sgras skye ba bdun bar mtshon par bya ste /
T02D1184:190b-16: mtshan nyid kyis mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1184:190b-17: khyad par ji lta bus she na /
T02D1184:190b-18: kye'i rdo rjer gsungs pa ste /
T02D1184:190b-19: kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du gsungs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1184:190b-20: lan bdun pa de ni thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1184:190b-21: de'i s'a li zos pas so //
T02D1184:190b-23: dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa yang dag pa'i ye shes sun 'byin pa ste /
T02D1184:190b-24: gang zhig yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi 'grub bde ni 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe pa'o //
T02D1184:190b-25: lan bdun pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1184:190b-26: skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang //
T02D1184:190b-27: dri lus sku bong chen po dang //
T02D1184:190b-28: de yi grib ma bdun 'byung ba //
T02D1184:190b-29: mthong nas rnal 'byor bas mtshon bya //
T02D1184:190b-30: de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1184:190b-31: skad cig las ni mkha' spyod 'gyur //
T02D1184:190b-32: mig dang ldan zhes pa mig yangs pa'o //
T02D1184:190b-33: dri lus zhes pa lus tsandan la sogs pa'i dri dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:190b-34: sku bong chen po zhes pa lus chen po'o //
T02D1184:190b-35: de'i grib ma bdun byung ba de mthong nas rnal 'byor bas mtshon par bya ste /
T02D1184:190b-36: grib ma bdun gyis lan bdun par mtshon par 'gyur
T02D1184:190b-37: ro / gsad pa skyon du 'gyur ba de lta
T02D1184:190b-38: mod kyi zhes thugs la gnas bar mdzad nas gsungs
T02D1184:190b-39: pa / de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni /
T02D1184:190b-40: skad cig de la mkha' spyod 'gyur //
T02D1184:190b-41: mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:190b-42: 'dis ni de yang mkha' la spyod pa 'grub par zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:190b-43: yang na gang lan bdun pa de'i sha zos pas des mkha' spyad 'gyur te /
T02D1184:191a-1: la spyod pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:191a-2: skad cig las zhes pa de'i skad cig las te /
T02D1184:191a-3: dus gzhan gyis bar du chod ba med do zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:191a-4: de nyid kyi phyir de ni 'grub bar 'gyur te /
T02D1184:191a-5: dga' ba la dga' ba la smod pa //
T02D1184:191a-6: dga' bral gyi dga' bas gang zhig 'grub pa de la smod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:191a-7: 'dis ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i ye shes kyis
T02D1184:191a-8: mkha' la spyod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i
T02D1184:191a-9: don no // yang na lan bdun pa zhes pa
T02D1184:191a-10: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa yang dang yang
T02D1184:191a-12: de na drug pa kho na bdun pa nyid do zhes pa lan bdun pa'o //
T02D1184:191a-13: des na rgyu de'i phyir mtshan nyid dang byed pa rnams kyis mtshon zhing shes par bya'o //
T02D1184:191a-14: lan bdun pa khyad par ji lta bus she na /
T02D1184:191a-17: kye'i rdo rje shes rab dang thabs gsungs pa rnams kyis te /
T02D1184:191a-18: de nyid kyi phyir 'grub par 'gyur ro ;
T02D1184:191a-19: / dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa //
T02D1184:191a-20: zhes pa dga' ba sun 'byin pa'i phyir dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa ste /
T02D1184:191a-21: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'o //
T02D1184:191a-22: skad snyan zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:191a-23: mig dang ldan zhes pa chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no ;
T02D1184:191a-24: / dri lus zhes pa sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:191a-25: de nyid kyi phyir sku gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi sku bong chen po ste /
T02D1184:191a-26: sku gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:191a-27: de nyid kyi phyir bdun bzlas pa nyid las grib ma bdun te /
T02D1184:191a-28: grib ma lta bu bdun ni grib ma yin zhing
T02D1184:191a-29: drug pa'i bdun pa nyid grib ma dang 'dra ba
T02D1184:191a-30: gzugs brnyan lta bur mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1184:191a-31: mthong zhing shes nas rnal 'byor pa de kho na dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:191a-32: drug pa rdo rje 'chad de yang lnga la rab
T02D1184:191a-33: tu zhugs pa'i phyir zos pa dang longs spyod par
T02D1184:191a-34: gyur pa ste / de gros pa tsam gyis mkha' spyod 'gyur mkha' dbang po'o //
T02D1184:191a-35: de la spyod pa'i phyir mkha' la spyod pa me
T02D1184:191a-36: long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang
T02D1184:191a-37: bzhin no // skad cig las zhes pa lhan cig
T02D1184:191a-38: skyes pa'i skad cig las 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1184:191a-39: bzhin no // pa'i don no // sems can thams cad dbang byed ba //
T02D1184:191a-40: ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs bshad //
T02D1184:191a-41: thams cad kyi sgras dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams so //
T02D1184:191b-0: sems can gyi @191b sgras srid pa gsum gcig pa nyid de /
T02D1184:191b-1: gsum po 'di nyid ni 'di rnams dbyer med pa nyid do //
T02D1184:191b-2: 'di nyid kyis dbang du byed pa dang dbang du 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1184:191b-3: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1184:191b-4: de nyid dbang du byed pa'i khyad par te /
T02D1184:191b-5: khyad par ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dbyer med
T02D1184:191b-6: par rtogs pa 'di nyid grub pa na lta stangs
T02D1184:191b-7: rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir khyad par du ku
T02D1184:191b-9: ku ru kulle zhes pa 'dis shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa bzhi ste /
T02D1184:191b-10: bdag med mas rgyas btab pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D1184:191b-11: de nyid kyi phyir sgrub thabs zhes pa de'i thabs su gyur pa bshad cing bstan par bya ste /
T02D1184:191b-12: thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:191b-13: kun rdzob kyi don ni go sla ba nyid do //
T02D1184:191b-14: sngon du brtag pa bcu gnyis kyis //
T02D1184:191b-15: rgyas par gsungs pa mdor bsdus pa //
T02D1184:191b-16: sngon du kye'i rdo rje 'bum phrag lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1184:191b-17: du brtag pa bcu gnyis kyis rgyas par gsungs pa
T02D1184:191b-18: ste / da ni mdor bsdus pa bshad par bya'o zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:191b-19: yang na brtag pa bcu gnyis kyis zhes pa rtog pa dang kun du rtog pa ni sems so //
T02D1184:191b-20: bcu gnyis ni gnyis kyis gras shes rab dang thabs so //
T02D1184:191b-21: de nyid dbang po dang yul gyi ngo bos bcu sta /
T02D1184:191b-22: brtag pa dang bcu gnyis ni brtag pa bcu gnyis so //
T02D1184:191b-23: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum
T02D1184:191b-24: gyi ngo bo rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin de
T02D1184:191b-25: rnams kyis gang zhig rgyas par gsungs pa de ni
T02D1184:191b-26: spro ba'i tshul gyis gsungs pa ste /
T02D1184:191b-27: de nyid sngon du thog ma'o //
T02D1184:191b-28: mdor bsdus pa ni thog ma kho na la sdud pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:191b-29: yang na de nyid mdor bsdus pa ste /
T02D1184:191b-31: sngon du dang por thog mar gnyis su med pa zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:191b-33: hr'i: yig las byung lha mo ni //
T02D1184:191b-34: kha dog dmar mo phyag bzhi ma //
T02D1184:191b-35: mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa dang //
T02D1184:191b-37: hr'i: yig gi sgras ha yig ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:191b-38: ra yig ni bdag med ma ste /
T02D1184:191b-40: a'a'i chu'i rnal 'byor ma byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1184:191b-41: de ni rnam par bcad pa'i mtha' can no //
T02D1184:191b-42: yi ge ni de'i bya ba'o //
T02D1184:191b-43: de las byung ba gang zhig skyes pa de ni hr'i: yig las byung ba ste /
T02D1184:191b-44: lha mo ni lha'i bdag nyid can spro ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:192a-1: dog dmar mo kun du chags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:192a-2: phyag bzhi ma bzhi rnams kyi longs spyod gang la yod pa de ni phyag bzhi ma'o //
T02D1184:192a-3: mda'i sgras 'bigs par byed pa nyid las shes rab bo //
T02D1184:192a-4: gzhu ni 'bigs par byed ba'i gzhi nyid kyis thabs so //
T02D1184:192a-5: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid kyis mda' dang gzhu'i lag pa ste /
T02D1184:192a-6: gang gi ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gnyis yin pa de ni mda' dang gzhu'i lag pa'o //
T02D1184:192a-7: dang yig ni gang gi phyir te /
T02D1184:192a-8: autpala'i sgras byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1184:192a-9: aam mkha' spyod ma ste bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor bco lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1184:192a-10: de gnyis ka 'dren cing 'gugs pa'i phyir //

T02D1184:204b-42: spros med bya sdud pas rnam par gnas par bya'o //

T02D1184:205a-2: ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang //
T02D1184:205a-3: ji ltar srid pa bar ma bzhin //
T02D1184:205a-4: rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1184:205a-6: bar chad med par goms pas sbyor ba gnyis su
T02D1184:205a-7: med par rtogs pa las dkyil 'khor lha'i rnam par
T02D1184:205a-8: bsgom pa so sor snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:205a-9: ji ltar sgyu ma zhes pa mngon sum nyid la bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin no //
T02D1184:205a-10: ji ltar rmi lam zhes pa mngon sum ma yin
T02D1184:205a-11: pa la bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin
T02D1184:205a-12: pa'o // ji ltar par ma'i srid pa bzhin //
T02D1184:205a-13: zhes pa rnam par shes pa tsam dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:205a-14: 'di ltar so sor gsal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:205a-16: ji ltar dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid de /
T02D1184:205a-17: de bzhin du sgyu ma snang ba sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:205a-18: rmi lam mtshan ma gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:205a-19: bar ma srid pa rnam par shes pa thugs rdo
T02D1184:205a-20: rje ste rdo rje gsum so sor snang bar 'gyur
T02D1184:205a-22: rtag tu bar chad med pa tha dad med pa'o //
T02D1184:205a-23: goms pa kun nas thams cad du brtan par gnas pa ni goms pa ste tha dad pa'o //
T02D1184:205a-24: rtag tu goms pa'i sgras tha dad med pa dang tha dad do //
T02D1184:205a-25: de dag sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste rtag tu
T02D1184:205a-26: goms pa'i sbyor ba la tha dad med pa dang
T02D1184:205a-27: tha dad mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes pa'i don no
T02D1184:205a-28: // bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dag gnyis su med pa nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1184:205a-29: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur la //
T02D1184:205a-30: ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po //
T02D1184:205a-31: 'di ni de yi mthu nyid de //
T02D1184:205a-33: dkyil 'khor 'di ni zhes pa lha'i rnam pa bsgom pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:205a-34: gzhan las 'byung ba med gzhan las skyes ba ma yin no //
T02D1184:205a-36: de'i zhes pa gang gi zhe na /
T02D1184:205a-37: ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po //
T02D1184:205a-38: gang zhig rtogs pa'i bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02D1184:205a-39: gang du phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba la chu'i dbang la sogs pa bdun po rnams la'o //
T02D1184:205a-40: 'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor yin gyi gzhan ma yin zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:205a-41: rim pa gnyis dbyer med pa nyid do zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:205a-42: yang na phyag rgya chen po zhes pa 'di chen
T02D1184:205a-43: po dang phyag rgya yang yin pa'i phyir phyag rgya
T02D1184:205a-44: chen po ste dga' ba bzhi'o //
T02D1184:205a-45: des dbang bskur ba dri ma med pa'i bya ba ste /
T02D1184:205b-0: @205b de rnams la ji ltar shes pa gang zhig myang ba'o //
T02D1184:205b-1: bde ba chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes de'i
T02D1184:205b-2: 'di nyid dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes
T02D1184:205b-3: so // khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D1184:205b-5: gzhan lhan cig ma yin pa ste bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:205b-7: gzhan dang 'byung ba ni gzhan 'byung ba'o //
T02D1184:205b-8: med ces pa de la shes rab dang thabs tha dad pa med ces pa ste ma ning ngo //
T02D1184:205b-9: de nyid kyi phyir phul du byung ba'i dngos po ni mthu ste /
T02D1184:205b-10: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang dbyer med pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:205b-12: bde ba nag po bde ba ser //
T02D1184:205b-13: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar //
T02D1184:205b-14: bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo //
T02D1184:205b-15: bde ba mtha' dag rgyu mi rgyu //
T02D1184:205b-16: bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs //
T02D1184:205b-17: de bzhin kun du ru skyes bde //
T02D1184:205b-18: bde ba dngos po dngos med bde //
T02D1184:205b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar dran //
T02D1184:205b-20: bde ba zhes pa gang zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:205b-21: de ni nag po dang ser po la sogs pa'i
T02D1184:205b-22: rnam pa nyams su myong bar gyur pa mtha' dag
T02D1184:205b-23: brtan pa dang / g-yo ba dang /
T02D1184:205b-26: de gnyis las skyes pa nyams su myong ba'i ye shes dang //
T02D1184:205b-27: dngos po dang dngos med dang rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1184:205b-28: zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes
T02D1184:205b-29: te / thams cad bskyed pa'i rim pa rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T02D1184:205b-30: don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin nyid de rim pa gnyis dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1184:205b-31: yang na bde ba zhes pa su khu ba dang /
T02D1184:205b-33: su dang kham ni bde ba'o //
T02D1184:205b-34: khu ba dang bde ba dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1184:205b-35: de ni nag po mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:205b-37: dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang sngon
T02D1184:205b-38: po ni rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med
T02D1184:205b-39: dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1184:205b-41: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin te de gnyis nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:205b-42: mtha' dag thams cad de rgyu mi rgyu zhes pa
T02D1184:205b-43: brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang dbang po dang yul
T02D1184:205b-45: shes rab dang thabs ni rdo rje dang padma'o //
T02D1184:205b-46: kun du ru skyes pa dga' ba gsum mo //
T02D1184:205b-47: dngos po dngos med ces pa bde ba gnyis so //
T02D1184:205b-48: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:205b-49: dran pa zhes pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T02D1184:206a-2: ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po //
T02D1184:206a-3: 'di ni de yi mthu nyid de //
T02D1184:206a-5: ces pa thugs la gnas par mdzad nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1184:206a-7: dam pa'i bde ba bde chen 'dod //
T02D1184:206a-8: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste //
T02D1184:206a-9: bskyed pa yis ni dgos pa ci //
T02D1184:206a-10: gal te gang zhig dam pa'i bde ba ye shes dang ldan pa de ni /
T02D1184:206a-11: bde ba chen po yin zhing /
T02D1184:206a-12: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rang bzhin rtogs pa'o //
T02D1184:206a-13: gang zhig bde ba chen po de yang rdzogs pa'i
T02D1184:206a-14: rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di'o zhes 'dod cing rdzogs pa'i
T02D1184:206a-15: rim pa la yang bsgom pa med do //
T02D1184:206a-16: de'i bskyed pa bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pas dgos pa ci ste /
T02D1184:206a-17: dgos pa cung zad kyang med do zhes zhus pa na /
T02D1184:206a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1184:206a-19: ae ma dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams //
T02D1184:206a-20: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di ;
T02D1184:206a-21: / ae ma zhes pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar du gyur pa nyid de /
T02D1184:206a-22: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po
T02D1184:206a-23: 'di gal te de ltar zhu ba de'i phyir 'di
T02D1184:206a-24: nyams te / 'dis chos dang chos ma yin pa mi shes pa nyid de /
T02D1184:206a-25: 'jal bar byed mi nus pa'i phyir nyams pa'o //
T02D1184:206a-26: ci ltar zhe na dang pa'i shugs kyis dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid de /
T02D1184:206a-27: 'dis chos kyi sku tsam nyid kho na nges kyi
T02D1184:206a-28: sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gnyis ka
T02D1184:206a-29: yang ma yin no zhes nyid kyi thugs la mtshar
T02D1184:206a-30: bar dgongs nas rdo rje snying po la slar gsungs
T02D1184:206a-31: pa / lus dngos med na gang las bde //
T02D1184:206a-32: bde ba smra bar mi nus te /
T02D1184:206a-33: khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1184:206a-35: lus kyi sgras 'phel ba'i mtshan nyid phung po lnga
T02D1184:206a-36: la sogs pa'i bdag nyid de'i dngos po med na
T02D1184:206a-37: bde ba nyams su myong ba'i ye shes ga la
T02D1184:206a-38: yod de / bde ba zhes smra bar mi nus pa nyid do //
T02D1184:206a-39: de'i phyir khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin gyis khyab bya lus dang khyab byed bde ba ste /
T02D1184:206a-40: de lta bu'i rang bzhin bde ba dang ye shes kyis 'gro ba khams gsum pa khyab ba'o //
T02D1184:206a-41: yang na lus dngos med ni zhes pa /
T02D1184:206a-42: aa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ni dngos med de /
T02D1184:206a-43: bdag med ma'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:206b-0: de yang lus te 'phel @206b ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1184:206b-1: 'di lus dang dngos med kyang yin pa'i phyir lus dngos med de /
T02D1184:206b-2: de ltar gyur pa na 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can
T02D1184:206b-3: rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bdag med ma nyid
T02D1184:206b-4: kyis so // gang las chos 'byung las te bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1184:206b-5: bde ba de yang smra bar mi nus te ngag gi lam las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1184:206b-6: khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1184:206b-7: zhes ba khyab bya khyab byed kyi bde ba lhan
T02D1184:206b-8: cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis 'gro ba khyab ste
T02D1184:206b-9: yang dag pa'i ye shes 'gro ba dang dbyer med
T02D1184:206b-10: pa nyid do zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:206b-11: 'di nyid dpes brtan par byed pa //
T02D1184:206b-12: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
T02D1184:206b-13: me tog dngos med las mi rtogs //
T02D1184:206b-14: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas //
T02D1184:206b-15: bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur //
T02D1184:206b-16: me tog la gnas pa'i dri rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur te /
T02D1184:206b-17: me tog gi dngos po med pa las ma yin
T02D1184:206b-18: pa ji lta bde bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa
T02D1184:206b-19: rnams kyi dngos po med pas bde ba dmigs par
T02D1184:206b-21: de'i phyir gzugs la mi gnas pa ni gzugs kyi dngos po med pa nyid do //
T02D1184:206b-22: 'dra ba ni cung zad khyad par gnas ba yin
T02D1184:206b-23: gyi de thams cad mtshungs pa ni ma yin no
T02D1184:206b-24: // 'on kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1184:206b-25: gzugs nyid gzugs med pa dang gzugs med pa nyid gzugs so zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:206b-27: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri //
T02D1184:206b-29: dri shes pa de ni re zhig me tog la
T02D1184:206b-30: gnas pa rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ro
T02D1184:206b-31: // me tog nyid gdod ma nas ma skyes ba
T02D1184:206b-32: nyid kyis dngos med las skye ba bkag pa'i phyir
T02D1184:206b-33: // / dri dang dri'i shes pa mi rtogs shing khong du chud par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1184:206b-34: gang zhig dri'i shes pa rtogs pa'i shes pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:206b-35: de bzhin du bde ba yang dag pa'i ye shes dmigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
T02D1184:206b-36: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
T02D1184:206b-38: gzugs la sogs pa dngos med bas //
T02D1184:206b-39: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi dngos po med pa ni aa'i rang bzhin gyis dngos po ste /
T02D1184:206b-40: des na gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin bdag med ma nyid kyis zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:206b-42: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste //
T02D1184:207a-3: bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs pa las //
T02D1184:207a-5: bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam par spangs nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa kho na'o //
T02D1184:207a-7: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
T02D1184:207a-8: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
T02D1184:207a-9: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //
T02D1184:207a-10: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02D1184:207a-12: 'di ni bden pa mthong ba gang zhig chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1184:207a-13: dri ma glo bur ba dang ldan pa rnams la
T02D1184:207a-14: rtag tu ma rig pa'i dbang gis dngos po'i de
T02D1184:207a-15: kho na rtogs pa med do //
T02D1184:207a-16: dngos po de kho na rtogs pa'i yang ma rig
T02D1184:207a-17: pa rnam par bsal nas dngos po de kho na
T02D1184:207a-19: gnyis ka la yang dngos po de kho na rtogs pa med do //
T02D1184:207a-20: dngos po'i de kho na rtogs pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid do //
T02D1184:207a-21: de nyid kyi phyir de ltar gyur pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:207a-22: rnams ni bdag gis mi shes te skyon cir ji
T02D1184:207a-23: ltar zhes pa'o ; / de'i phyir rtag tu ma
T02D1184:207a-24: rig pas gnas pa rnams kyi dri ma glo bur
T02D1184:207a-25: bsal ba'i don du lha'i rnam pa'i rnam par dag
T02D1184:207a-26: pa'i dngos po zhes pa bskyed pa'i rim pa ste
T02D1184:207a-27: ltar zhes pa'o ; / de nyid skad cig la
T02D1184:207a-28: mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon du gyur pa'i phyir 'di
T02D1184:207a-29: dang de'o zhes pa rnam par bcad par mi nus
T02D1184:207a-30: pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'gyur
T02D1184:207a-31: ltar zhes pa'o ; / ro // lha'i rnam par
T02D1184:207a-32: dag pa dang de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag
T02D1184:207a-33: pa 'di ni gnyis su med de /
T02D1184:207a-34: gnyis su byar med pa tha dad cing gcad du med pa'o zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:207a-35: bskyed pa yis ni dgos pa ci //
T02D1184:207a-36: zhes gang zhig rdo rje snying po'i zhu ba 'di
T02D1184:207a-37: ni de rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes
T02D1184:207a-38: gnyen spangs pa nyams pa'i chos can lta bu ste
T02D1184:207a-39: / ae ma dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams //
T02D1184:207a-40: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di //
T02D1184:207a-41: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs la 'khrungs pa'o //
T02D1184:207a-43: bdag nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
T02D1184:207a-44: kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dgos pa chen po gsungs
T02D1184:207a-45: pa / dngos nga dngos po med par //
T02D1184:207a-46: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa //
T02D1184:207a-47: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa'i gzugs nyid kyis nga
T02D1184:207a-48: nyid re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos po ste
T02D1184:207a-50: dngos po med pa nga nyid de //
T02D1184:207b-0: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam @207b pa'i gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:207b-1: sangs rgyas nga nyid de rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas so //
T02D1184:207b-3: dngos po rtogs pa nyid las sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1184:207b-4: de'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs pa kho nas
T02D1184:207b-5: rdzogs pa'i rim pa nges pa'o zhes pa'i don no
T02D1184:207b-8: ham yig gi ngo bo nyid ni dngos po ste /
T02D1184:207b-9: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1184:207b-10: de nyid dngos po med par nga nyid de /
T02D1184:207b-11: gnyis ka tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:207b-12: nga nyid sangs rgyas te shes rab dang thabs dbyer med par shes pa'o ;
T02D1184:207b-13: / ji ltar zhe na dngos po rtogs phyir gang
T02D1184:207b-14: zhig gnyis ka dbyer med pa ma yin pa'i dngos
T02D1184:207b-16: dngos po thams cad shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin kho na zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:207b-18: gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang //
T02D1184:207b-19: rmongs pa gang zhig nga mi shes //
T02D1184:207b-20: dam pa nga spyod bde ba can ;
T02D1184:207b-21: / rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
T02D1184:207b-22: rmongs pa gang zhig gti mug gis bsgribs pa de rnams kyis nga mi shes te /
T02D1184:207b-23: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ni re
T02D1184:207b-24: zhig rmongs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa
T02D1184:207b-25: kho na'o // shes rab rnon po nyid kyis ni
T02D1184:207b-26: gal de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa rtogs
T02D1184:207b-27: par 'gyur ba de lta na yang /
T02D1184:207b-28: dngos po'i de kho na nges par rtogs pa nyid de /
T02D1184:207b-29: bskyed pa'i rim pa las gzhan pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1184:207b-30: pa med pa kho na'o zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro
T02D1184:207b-31: // gang zhig le los bsnun pa zhes pa le lo ni sgyid lug pa yin zhing /
T02D1184:207b-32: bsnun pa ni bcom pa ste lha'i rnam par sprul
T02D1184:207b-33: pa bsgom pas ci zhes brtson 'grus dman pa lha'i
T02D1184:207b-34: rnam par dag pa mi shes pa'o //
T02D1184:207b-35: de rnams kyis kyang nga mi shes so //
T02D1184:207b-36: bskyed pa'i rim pa goms pas ni gnyis ka'i rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1184:207b-37: de ltar na yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni bskyed
T02D1184:207b-38: pa'i rim pa las gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o
T02D1184:207b-39: zhes pa'o // dam pa da spyod bde ba can //
T02D1184:207b-40: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la //
T02D1184:207b-41: nga zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa ste /
T02D1184:207b-42: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ma ning gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:207b-44: spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku yis nga rnam par gnas so //
T02D1184:207b-45: bde ba can yang gang zhe na /
T02D1184:208a-1: btsun mo'i bha ga zhes pa gang zhig bde ba
T02D1184:208a-2: dang ldan pa de ni rdo rje btsun mo ste
T02D1184:208a-3: / de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste de'i bha ga ni ye shes so //
T02D1184:208a-5: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ste btsun mo ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:208a-6: rdo rje dang btsun mo ni rdo rje btsun mo ste shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'o /
T02D1184:208a-7: de'i bha ga la des dbyer med pa'i ye shes la'o //
T02D1184:208a-8: 'dis ni rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ba gsungs so //
T02D1184:208a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba gsungs pa /
T02D1184:208a-10: ae yig rnam pa'i gzugs can ni //
T02D1184:208a-11: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ae yig
T02D1184:208a-12: gi rnam pa ni ae yig gi rnam pa ste
T02D1184:208a-14: de'i gzugs can de'i rang bzhin la'o //
T02D1184:208a-16: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / sangs rgyas
T02D1184:208a-17: kyi sgras me long lta bu la sogs pa ye

T02D1184:218a-19: dga' nyid mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin te
T02D1184:218a-20: las so // / rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha //
T02D1184:218a-23: gcig nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbyer med pa
T02D1184:218a-24: ste thams cad gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid do
T02D1184:218a-25: // de nyid rnam par mi gsal pa gsal bar byed pa /
T02D1184:218a-27: reg pas sra ba'i bag chags te //
T02D1184:218a-28: sra ba gti mug chos kyi phyir //
T02D1184:218a-29: gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
T02D1184:218a-30: gang phyir khu ba byang chub sems //
T02D1184:218a-31: khu ba chu yi khams su brjod //
T02D1184:218a-32: chu ni mi bskyod rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1184:218a-33: zhes sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa //
T02D1184:218a-34: gnyis ka bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1184:218a-35: drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1184:218a-36: 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin //
T02D1184:218a-38: kakko lar ni gang zhig sems //
T02D1184:218a-39: de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can //
T02D1184:218a-40: phrag dog don yod grub pa yin //
T02D1184:218a-41: don yong rlung las byung ba'o //
T02D1184:218a-43: dga' ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1184:218a-44: nam mkha' ser sna rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02D1184:218a-45: ser sna nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
T02D1184:218a-46: sems ni chen po gcig nyid la //
T02D1184:218a-47: lnga yi gzugs kyis mtshon pa ste //
T02D1184:218a-48: rigs ni lnga po de nyid la //
T02D1184:218b-0: stong phrag du ma @218b skyes pa'o //
T02D1184:218b-1: de'i phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig / bde ba
T02D1184:218b-2: chen po rtag pa mchog /'dod chags la sogs sems
T02D1184:218b-3: lnga yis // dbye bas lnga ru grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1184:218b-5: 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las //
T02D1184:218b-7: dga' ba chen po gcig nyid ni //
T02D1184:218b-9: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa tshigs su
T02D1184:218b-10: bcad pa 'di rnams te rdo rje dang padma mnyam
T02D1184:218b-12: skad cig de la sra ba'i bag chags skye bar
T02D1184:218b-13: 'gyur te sra ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis sa'i khams
T02D1184:218b-14: so // de yang gti mug mi gsal ba'i chos te /
T02D1184:218b-15: de nyid rnam par snang mdzad brjod //
T02D1184:218b-16: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum dang //
T02D1184:218b-17: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:218b-18: de nyid kyi phyir bolla kakko la sbyor ba reg
T02D1184:218b-19: pa las byang chub kyi sems nang du thim pa
T02D1184:218b-20: gsal pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de'o //
T02D1184:218b-21: de ni khu ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1184:218b-22: de yang chu yi khams su brjod //
T02D1184:218b-23: ces pa ye shes lnga dang /
T02D1184:218b-25: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:218b-26: chu ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis zhe sdang ste /
T02D1184:218b-27: 'dir rnam pa gnyis nyid do zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:218b-28: 'dren pa mi bskyod pa zhes pa byang chub kyi
T02D1184:218b-29: sems 'di nyid thams cad kyi bdag bo yin pa'i
T02D1184:218b-31: mi bskyod pa dang 'dren pa ni 'dren pa mi
T02D1184:218b-32: ba skyod pas te rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan
T02D1184:218b-33: cig dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:218b-34: de nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang ngo //
T02D1184:218b-35: 'di nyid la nga rgyal yang nang du gtogs te tha dad pa ma yin no //
T02D1184:218b-36: rdo rje dang padma bskyod pas me'i khams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:218b-37: de yang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1184:218b-38: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyis rtag tu 'byung
T02D1184:218b-39: ba'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbang
T02D1184:218b-40: po'o // de nyid 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje ste /
T02D1184:218b-41: dpag med rdo rje zhes pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1184:218b-42: gang gi phyir 'dod chags 'dod dpag med de gang las te /
T02D1184:218b-43: me'i khams las skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:218b-45: 'dus pa'i ngo bor 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur te /
T02D1184:219a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang po nas dbyer @219a * //
T02D1184:219a-1: med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:219a-2: kakko lar ni gang zhig sems //
T02D1184:219a-3: zhes pa lha mo'i padma'i nang du rgyu'i sems so //
T02D1184:219a-4: de ni rlung gi rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:219a-5: g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rlung gi khams zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:219a-6: de yang don yong grub pa ste gang gi phyir /
T02D1184:219a-7: don yod rlung las 'byung ba ste /
T02D1184:219a-8: rta mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las don yod ces dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:219a-10: yang na gang rlung las 'byung zhes pa thams cad
T02D1184:219a-11: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bde ba nyams
T02D1184:219a-12: su myong ba'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1184:219a-16: kun du chags par gyur pa'o //
T02D1184:219a-17: dga' ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ces pa bde ba
T02D1184:219a-18: nam mkha'i khams zhes pa'i gsungs las nam mkha'i khams
T02D1184:219a-19: te nam mkha' yang ser sna rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:219a-20: ser sna rdo rje zhes pa rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1184:219a-21: 'dis ni sngar rin chen dbang po ser sna rnam par dag pas rab tu bstan ba'o //
T02D1184:219a-22: 'dis ni 'od dpag med rnam par dag ba nyid rin chen dbang po dang /
T02D1184:219a-23: rin chen dbang po rnam par dag pa nyid 'od dpag med de /
T02D1184:219a-24: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med
T02D1184:219a-25: pa gang yin pa de nyid sa la sogs pa
T02D1184:219a-26: 'byung ba chen po lnga po rnams dang yul lnga'i
T02D1184:219a-28: de nyid gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga dang dbang po rnams so //
T02D1184:219a-29: de nyid skye mched drug ste gti mug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1184:219a-30: 'dis ni de nyid yul dang dbang po dang rnam
T02D1184:219a-31: par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rdo rje gsum
T02D1184:219a-32: gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:219a-33: dga' ba chen po nyid kyis bzhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:219a-34: gcig nyid ces ba gnyis su med de /
T02D1184:219a-35: 'di ni khams gsum ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:219a-36: de nyid gsal bar byed pa sems gcig nyid byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1184:219a-37: chen po ni gang lngas lnga'i gzugs kyis mtshon cing rtogs pa'o //
T02D1184:219a-38: rigs lnga bo rnams la skyes par gyur ba ste /
T02D1184:219a-39: gcig po de nyid la stong phrag du mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:219b-0: gcig nyid lnga'i dbye bas du mar 'gyur @219b ba'i
T02D1184:219b-1: phyir de las slar yang re re la lnga lnga'i
T02D1184:219b-2: dbye bas phye par gyur ba na brgya dang stong
T02D1184:219b-3: du 'gyur zhing rigs mtha' yas par 'gyur te mngon
T02D1184:219b-4: par gsal lo // de'i phyir 'di dag rang bzhin nyid bde ba chen po ste /
T02D1184:219b-5: thams cad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:219b-6: de nyid kyi phyir mchog tu rtag pa rnam pa thams cad gcig pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:219b-7: dbyer med pa nyid dbye bas yongs su brtags par gyur pa na lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur /
T02D1184:219b-8: ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1184:219b-9: 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yis //
T02D1184:219b-10: 'od dpag med nyid dang po gtso bo'i rgyu ste /
T02D1184:219b-11: gang las de rnam par shes pa lnga po rnams kyis zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:219b-12: stong phrag du ma zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1184:219b-13: gang+g'a'i klung ni bcu yi bye ma snyed //
T02D1184:219b-14: rigs gcig rnams la de bzhin gshegs chogs rnams //
T02D1184:219b-15: rigs kyi tshogs la mtha' yas rigs rnams te //
T02D1184:219b-16: de rnams rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya //
T02D1184:219b-17: da rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams //
T02D1184:219b-18: bye ba'i rigs ni mang po rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1184:219b-19: bye ba'i rigs la grangs med rigs rnams te //
T02D1184:219b-20: mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams //
T02D1184:219b-21: rigs gcig rnams la zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1184:219b-22: gcig la mang bo'i tshig ni sdud pa'i tshul gyis
T02D1184:219b-23: gcig la mtha' yas pa'i mthar thug pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:219b-24: nyid kyis rnam par gnas so zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:219b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ji snyed ce na /
T02D1184:219b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ni dman pa'i sems can gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ste /
T02D1184:219b-27: de yang khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D1184:219b-28: gang+ga'i klung ni bcu'i bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1184:219b-29: 'dis bgrangs bas mthar thug pa lta bur mtshon par bya ste /
T02D1184:219b-30: mthar thug pa med par yang gsungs pa ni bar
T02D1184:219b-31: ma'i sems can gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa'i
T02D1184:219b-32: phyir ro // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po de
T02D1184:219b-33: rnams gang+ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyid dang mtshungs pa
T02D1184:219b-34: rnams la mtha' yas pa'i rigs rnams te grangs med
T02D1184:219b-36: mchog gi sems can gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1184:219b-37: ji ltar mtha' yas pa'i rigs nyid ce na /
T02D1184:220a-1: de rnams rigs la zhes pa des par 'dzin ba la bdun pa ste /
T02D1184:220a-2: de rnams kyi nang nas cung zad rigs gcig gang yin ba'o //
T02D1184:220a-3: de nyid la mang bo'i tshig kyang de nyid mang po nyid kyi tshig go //
T02D1184:220a-4: rigs ni rnams pa brgya zhes pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /
T02D1184:220a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can te re re la lnga pa lnga ste /
T02D1184:220a-6: nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur zhing bzhi yis bsgyur bas brgya ru 'gyur te rigs brgya rnams so //
T02D1184:220a-7: de rnams kyang lnga'i dbye bas lnga brgya ste /
T02D1184:220a-8: stong dang khri la sogs ba'i dbye bas 'bum phrag rigs rnams so //
T02D1184:220a-9: de nyid kyi phyir re zhig chen bo ste de
T02D1184:220a-10: rnams kyang rnam pa lngas phye bar gyur pa 'bum
T02D1184:220a-11: phrag lnga la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'bum phrag nyi
T02D1184:220a-13: 'byung pa chen po bzhi'i bdag nyid kyis de rnams bzhi 'gyur bye ba'i rigs rnams so //
T02D1184:220a-14: de ltar re zhig mang po rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:220a-15: bye ba'i rigs la grangs med rigs rnams te /
T02D1184:220a-16: de kho na ltar rnam pa lnga'i dbye bas grangs med pa'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:220a-17: grangs med rigs rnams zhes pa mang po'i tshig gis
T02D1184:220a-18: ni mtha' med pa nyid kyi phyir rigs mtha' yas
T02D1184:220a-21: mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams //
T02D1184:220a-22: zhes pa mchog tu dga' ba'i sgras lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba brjod de /
T02D1184:220a-23: de las byung pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad de /
T02D1184:220a-24: 'di dag gnyis su med su med cing gnyis su byar med pa'o //
T02D1184:220a-25: rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1184:220a-27: zhes dngos grub kyi dgos pa ni rim pa gnyis dbyer med pas grangs med pa'i rigs las /
T02D1184:220a-28: mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes
T02D1184:220a-29: pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rnam par gsal
T02D1184:220a-31: kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sngom par
T02D1184:220a-32: dngos grub gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
T02D1184:220a-33: ste gnyis ba'o // kye'i rdo rje zhes pa rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1184:220a-34: mkha' 'gro ma dra pa'i sngom pa zhes pa /
T02D1184:220a-35: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sgras bdag med ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02D1184:220b-0: sngom pa'i @220b sgras rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1184:220b-1: bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'chang
T02D1184:220b-2: gi ye shes gnyis ka la dbyer med par rtogs
T02D1184:220b-3: pa sa ni nges par gdon mi za bar dngos
T02D1184:220b-4: grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dngos grub gtan la
T02D1184:220b-5: dbab pa'o // de ltar gyur pa'i le'u ni sbas pa'i don gsal bar byed pa ste /
T02D1184:220b-6: gnyis pa ni gnyis kyis rdzogs pa gnyis ka'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:220b-7: yang na gang gnyis pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:220b-8: gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes ba'i don no //
T02D1184:220b-9: zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin
T02D1184:220b-10: tu dri ma med pa las brtag pa gnyis pa'i
T02D1184:220b-13: / da ni dngos grub gtan la phab pas the tshom
T02D1184:220b-14: med pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa ni mi
T02D1184:220b-15: g-yo ba'i sar zhugs pa'i mthar thug par bdud kyi
T02D1184:220b-16: ris kyi sems can gyi 'jug pas gsungs pa'i don
T02D1184:220b-17: res 'ga' brjod par 'gyur ro zhes dgos pa na
T02D1184:220b-18: / bcom ldan 'das rang nyid rgyud thams cad kyi
T02D1184:220b-19: gleng gzhi'i thabs rnal 'byor ma rnams la ston par
T02D1184:220b-22: de nas rdo rje can gyis rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs /
T02D1184:220b-23: rnal 'byor ma rnams la bka' stsal pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:220b-24: rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ye shes rnam par shes
T02D1184:220b-25: pa la sogs pa ma lus pa'i nus pa yang
T02D1184:220b-26: dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthar thug pa
T02D1184:220b-28: de'i gleng gzhi ni dang bo'i rgyu'o //
T02D1184:220b-29: de nas zhes pa de ma thag bar ma chad pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1184:220b-30: rdo rje can zhes pa mi phyed pa'i sku'o zhes bya ba ni brda tsam ste /
T02D1184:220b-31: 'di ni gang gi yul las 'das pa'o //
T02D1184:220b-32: de nyid rdo rje can zhes brjod do //
T02D1184:220b-33: de yang thabs te rdo rje 'chang gi ye shes
T02D1184:220b-34: te gang rnams kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ste
T02D1184:220b-35: / rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes dang dbyer
T02D1184:220b-36: med pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje 'chang gi ye
T02D1184:220b-37: shes bdag med pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1184:220b-38: bka' stsal pa zhes pa brjod par bya ba ma
T02D1184:220b-39: yin pa nyid chos bstan pa mngon par gsal bas
T02D1184:220b-40: mngon par brjod par mdzad pa ste /
T02D1184:220b-42: gang gi brtse bas bstan pa'i chos //
T02D1184:220b-43: rjod byed rnams kyis brjod ya min //
T02D1184:220b-45: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i thabs de nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1184:221a-2: de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang //
T02D1184:221a-3: dga' ba skad cig dbye ba dang //
T02D1184:221a-4: gzhan yang bza' la sogs pa'o //
T02D1184:221a-5: zhes pa 'di ni mdor bsdus pa ste 'di'i rnam par bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1184:221a-6: de la zhes pa sdom pa la sogs pa gsungs pa la re zhig sdom pa bka' stsal pa /
T02D1184:221a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni //
T02D1184:221a-8: ae wam yi ge so sor gnas //
T02D1184:221a-9: de yang dbang las shes 'gyur te //
T02D1184:221a-10: rang gis rig bya bde chen po //

T02D1184:221a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni sdud cig pa'o //
T02D1184:221a-13: so sor gnas te so so re rer gnas so //
T02D1184:221a-15: ae wam yi ger shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la'o //
T02D1184:221a-16: yang na gang sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes pa phung

T02D1184:221a-18: ae wam yi ger shes rab dang thabs gnyis su

T02D1184:221a-20: ge ye shes so sor gnas te /
T02D1184:221a-21: so so re rer gnas so //
T02D1184:221a-22: 'dis shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa rtogs pa
T02D1184:221a-23: zhes bya ba spro ba dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:221a-24: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi ye shes
T02D1184:221a-26: ae wam ma y'a zhes pa la sogs pa le'u
T02D1184:221a-27: dang por mdor bstan pa'i ae wam nyid gleng gzhi'i
T02D1184:221a-28: tshig go // sdom pa de nyid ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02D1184:221a-30: dbang las zhes pa dbang bskur ba'i le'ur mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T02D1184:221a-31: dbang bskur dang zhes mdor bsdus pa'i rnam pa bshad
T02D1184:221a-32: pa las shes par 'gyur zhing rtogs par 'gyur ro
T02D1184:221a-34: sdom pa de yang ste ma ning ngo //
T02D1184:221a-35: rang gis rig bya bde chen po //
T02D1184:221a-36: zhes bya ba yang dag pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:221a-37: de la zhes pa ae wam rnam par gnas pa la'o //
T02D1184:221a-38: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D1184:221a-39: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ae wam zhus pa de
T02D1184:221a-40: nas zhes pa bar mchad par rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1184:221a-41: zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa ste /

T02D1184:221b-0: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhes pa bdag med ma la sogs pa @221b rnams kyis /

T02D1184:221b-2: zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur bzhus pa ste /

T02D1184:221b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la /
T02D1184:221b-6: mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa ni //

T02D1184:224b-33: 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab stug por byid ba skyabs med bdag skyabs mdzod /

T02D1184:225a-0: @225a * // dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa ste //

T02D1184:225a-7: pa'i rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa mngon du

T02D1184:225a-37: sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la //
T02D1184:225a-38: ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che //

T02D1184:225a-45: byang chub kyi sgras yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D1184:225a-46: de nyid snying po ste bstan pa'o //

T02D1184:225b-5: bya ba rdzogs pa byin nas chu la sogs pa'i chog rab tu bsgrubs nas so //
T02D1184:225b-7: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bya ba rdzogs pa brjod par bya ste /

T02D1184:225b-27: g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:225b-29: gnyis med gnyis kyi rang bzhin te dngos po dang

T02D1184:226a-1: lo ni mi shes pa gcod pa nyid las bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:226a-2: dkyil 'khor dang 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste /

T02D1184:226a-11: de yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan la 'di skad ces gsol to //

T02D1184:226a-14: rnal 'byor ma thams cad bzod par gyur nas so //

T02D1184:226a-24: sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la //

T02D1184:226a-26: ji ltar rigs pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1184:226a-27: bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol zhes pa mang po'i tshig ni zhes pa las so //
T02D1184:226a-28: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gang yin pa de ci zhig mngon par brjod //
T02D1184:226a-29: de yang grong khyer ni lus so //
T02D1184:226a-31: sangs rgyas kun bdag ces pa yul rnams so //
T02D1184:226a-32: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste dbang po rnams so //

T02D1184:226b-24: khams kyi sgras 'byung ba chen po zhes pa'o //

T02D1184:227a-38: btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin pa //

T02D1184:227a-45: rgyu gang gi phyir srog gi brda ni sems zhes pa'o //

T02D1184:227b-1: ma med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su

T02D1184:228a-0: rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma thams cad la @228a * //

T02D1184:231a-13: bdud rtsi'i ro yang btung bar stob par byed de

T02D1184:231b-2: pa ste / des mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:231b-3: bdag gis zhes pa rang nyid do //
T02D1184:231b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes pa me long lta bu
T02D1184:231b-5: la sogs pa ye shes lnga yis phyag mdzad pa
T02D1184:231b-6: zhes pa rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa nyid kyis
T02D1184:231b-7: nges par gyur pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:231b-8: de nas lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur te
T02D1184:231b-9: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
T02D1184:231b-10: bcom ldan 'das ga la bder thal mo sbyar ba
T02D1184:231b-11: btud de / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to
T02D1184:231b-12: zhes pa sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1184:231b-13: can yang dag pa'i ye shes khong du chud de
T02D1184:231b-14: btud de / / lha mo thams cad rol pa ma lus pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:231b-15: de nyid kyi phyir dga' bar gyur pa spro ba
T02D1184:231b-16: dang sdud pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can no
T02D1184:231b-17: // de nas zhes pa bden pa gnyis dbyer med
T02D1184:231b-18: pa rtogs par gyur pa na btud nas sku gsung
T02D1184:231b-19: thugs dbyer med pas phyag byas te /
T02D1184:231b-20: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
T02D1184:231b-21: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar
T02D1184:231b-22: ba byas te zhes pa tshul de ltar byas nas
T02D1184:231b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa nyan par byed do
T02D1184:231b-24: zhes pa'o // der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1184:231b-25: bza' btung ji ltar snyed pa dang //
T02D1184:231b-26: bgrod dang bgrod min spang mi bya //
T02D1184:231b-27: yul la sogs pa ma lus pa rnams kyi rang
T02D1184:231b-28: bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1184:231b-29: rang bzhin nyid kyis de la bza' btung la sogs
T02D1184:231b-30: pa'i rnam par rtog pa med do zhes dgongs pa
T02D1184:231b-31: ste / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las rnam par
T02D1184:231b-32: grol ba nyid kyi spros pa med pa'i spyod pas
T02D1184:231b-33: gnas pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:231b-35: bza' btung ji ltar rnyed par spang mi bya zhes
T02D1184:231b-36: pa snang ba dang mngon par brjod pa rnam par
T02D1184:231b-37: dag pa'o // bgrod dang bgrod min spang mi bya //
T02D1184:231b-38: zhes pa yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1184:231b-39: 'dis ni rdo rje gsum rnam par dag pa 'di nyid ye shes zhes pa'o ;
T02D1184:231b-40: / khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste /
T02D1184:231b-41: grong pa'i chos ni spang mi bya //
T02D1184:231b-43: gtsang spra ni mi gtsang ba sel bar byed pa
T02D1184:231b-44: ste de'i phyir de kho na'i rnal 'byor pas mi
T02D1184:231b-45: bya'o // grong pa'i chos ni spang mi bya //
T02D1184:231b-46: grong pa'i chos sgrib pa yang bya ba nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-2: des dri ma med par byed pa ni gtsang spra ste sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-3: de mi bya ste gnyen po bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa med do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-5: nges par dngos po thams cad kyi //
T02D1184:232a-6: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02D1184:232a-9: grong pa'i chos ni sdang mi bya //
T02D1184:232a-10: de nyid la bzhi pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin nyid
T02D1184:232a-11: kyi rnam par dag pa rtogs pa'i phyir zhes dgongs
T02D1184:232a-13: blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing //
T02D1184:232a-14: bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya //
T02D1184:232a-15: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1184:232a-16: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02D1184:232a-17: zhes pa phyi rol gyi bzlas pa la gzhol ba
T02D1184:232a-18: ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa mngon par mi shes na
T02D1184:232a-19: 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir sngags bzlas pa bkag
T02D1184:232a-21: blo ldan bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya //
T02D1184:232a-22: zhes pa zhal dang phyag dang rnam pa la sogs
T02D1184:232a-23: pa sprul pa'i sku'i lha bsgom pa ni rdo rje
T02D1184:232a-24: bzlas pa'i nang du thim pa nyid do zhes lha'i
T02D1184:232a-26: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1184:232a-28: 'chi ba'i kun du rtog pa yongs su spangs pa nyid kyi phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-29: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02D1184:232a-30: zhes pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang dbyer med
T02D1184:232a-31: pa nyid don dam pa'i bden pa'o zhes the tshom
T02D1184:232a-32: med par rnyed pa shes pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-34: blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing //
T02D1184:232a-35: zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-36: bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya //
T02D1184:232a-37: zhes pa chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-38: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1184:232a-39: zhes pa gti mug spong ba bkag pa las 'di'i sprul pa'i sku yang bstan pa'o //
T02D1184:232a-40: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'di rnal 'byor ma rnams la bstan pas thog ma kho nar byung zhing /
T02D1184:232a-41: rjes la chos kyi sku dang sprul pa'i sku yang nye bar bstan to zhes pa'o ;
T02D1184:232a-42: / da ni sku gsum dbyer med pa nyid mngon par gsal bar byed pa /
T02D1184:232a-43: ba la thams cad bza' bar bya //
T02D1184:232a-44: rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D1184:232a-45: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1184:232a-46: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya //
T02D1184:232a-47: chos thams cad kyi dbyings las byung pa nyid kyi
T02D1184:232b-0: phyir blang dor bya ba @232b cung zad kyang med
T02D1184:232b-1: do // de'i phyir ba la thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1184:232b-2: rgyu'i sbyor ba dang bral bas kyang chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis /
T02D1184:232b-3: rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D1184:232b-4: rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa yongs su spangs
T02D1184:232b-5: pa nyid las reg par bya ba dang reg par
T02D1184:232b-6: bya ba ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa med
T02D1184:232b-7: pa'i phyir ro // btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya ba 'di ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1184:232b-8: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1184:232b-9: rgyu yis rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems nyid las te /
T02D1184:232b-10: 'dis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D1184:232b-11: smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bstan to zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:232b-13: ba la thams cad bza' bar bya //
T02D1184:232b-14: zhes pa sku rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:232b-15: rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D1184:232b-16: ces pa gsung rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:232b-17: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya //
T02D1184:232b-18: zhes pa thugs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:232b-19: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1184:232b-20: zhes pa rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:232b-22: bshes la sdug par mi bya zhing //
T02D1184:232b-23: de bzhin sdug la sdang mi bya //
T02D1184:232b-24: rdo shing 'jim pa'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D1184:232b-25: lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya //
T02D1184:232b-26: zhes pa bshes dang bshes ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa yongs su spangs pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1184:232b-27: bshes la sdug pa zhes pa la sogs pa phyed snga ma'o //
T02D1184:232b-28: nang gi lha'i rang bzhin nyid las sems g-yo ba
T02D1184:232b-29: med pas phyi rol gyi lha'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D1184:232b-30: la yid dga' ba med pa'i phyir rdo shing 'jim
T02D1184:232b-31: pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha 'di rnams mdun du byung
T02D1184:232b-32: ba na phyag mi bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:232b-34: bshes kyi sgras dbang po rnams so //
T02D1184:232b-35: sdug pa ni chags pa ste de mi bya'o //
T02D1184:232b-36: sdug pa zhes pa ma ning ste /
T02D1184:232b-37: byams pa bsgoms pas mnyam pa nyid kyis ma ning nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1184:232b-38: gdug la sdang zhes pa gdug pa'i sems la zhe sdang gnyis su 'dod par mi bya ste /
T02D1184:232b-39: sdang zhes pa ni ma ning gnyis su med pas so //
T02D1184:232b-40: lha ni rol par byed pa ste /
T02D1184:232b-41: 'di rnams la rol pa de yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:232b-43: lha de rnams la phyag mi bya ste de'i mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
T02D1184:233a-0: rdo shing 'jim pa'i rang bzhin rnams te bems @233a * //
T02D1184:233a-1: po'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par gnas pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:233a-2: rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D1184:233a-3: ces mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par bshad pa /
T02D1184:233a-4: g-yung po gdol pa ko lpags mkhan //
T02D1184:233a-5: phyag dar mkhan sogs rigs ngan dang //
T02D1184:233a-6: bram ze rgyal rigs rje dmangs rnams //
T02D1184:233a-7: bdag gi lus ltar reg par bya //
T02D1184:233a-8: zhes pa don rab tu gsal ba kho na'o //
T02D1184:233a-10: g-yung po la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1184:233a-11: bram ze rgyal rigs la sogs pa lnga pa gnyis
T02D1184:233a-12: ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid gnyis bstan pa'o
T02D1184:233a-13: // bdag gi lus ltar zhes pa sems kyi lus
T02D1184:233a-14: nyid kyi phyir rang gi lus lta bur chos thams
T02D1184:233a-15: cad la reg par bya ste /
T02D1184:233a-16: sems de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:233a-17: bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang //
T02D1184:233a-18: dug dang nim pa bu btsas skyes //
T02D1184:233a-19: skyur dang mngar dang bska ba sogs //
T02D1184:233a-20: kha ba lan tshva tsha ba dang //
T02D1184:233a-21: dri dang dri zhim chu dang khrag / byang chub sems kyis bza' bar bya //
T02D1184:233a-22: byang chub sems kyi sgras gnyis su med pa rtogs pa ste /
T02D1184:233a-23: the tshom dang bral ba nyid kyis kun du spyad
T02D1184:233a-24: par bya'o zhes pa ste don go sla ba nyid
T02D1184:233a-25: do // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1184:233a-26: gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni //
T02D1184:233a-27: mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D1184:233a-28: rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni //
T02D1184:233a-29: padma'i snod du gzhag bya zhing //
T02D1184:233a-30: lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis //
T02D1184:233a-31: bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung //
T02D1184:233a-32: rang byung gi sgras khu ba ste me tog ni rin chen dbang po'o //
T02D1184:233a-33: 'di gnyis rnyed nas padma'i snod du thod par gzhag par bya zhing /
T02D1184:233a-34: brtul zhugs can nges pa brtan pa'o //
T02D1184:233a-35: lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis //
T02D1184:233a-36: gcig tu byas nas btung bar bya'o zhes pa'i don 'di ni 'di'i don no //
T02D1184:233a-38: lud pa dang ni snabs ngag gis //
T02D1184:233a-39: zhes pa kha dang sna'i bu ga dag bsres te /
T02D1184:233a-40: n'a nga'i phreng ba gnyis kha dang sna'i bu ga las 'og tu drangs te /
T02D1184:233a-41: khu ba'i gzugs kyis padma'i snod du lha mo'i nang du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1184:233a-42: de nas rang byung me tog khu ba dang bde
T02D1184:233a-43: ba'i rnam par dbyer med pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D1184:233a-45: rnyed pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di nyid ces pa nges pa'i don no //
T02D1184:233b-0: bdud @233b rtsi lnga la sogs pa thams cad mi
T02D1184:233b-1: bza' cung zad yod ma yin zhes pa'i bar gyis
T02D1184:233b-2: sku rdo rje'i mngon par zhen pa yongs su spong
T02D1184:233b-3: ba'o // rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni //
T02D1184:233b-4: btung bar bya zhes pa'i bar gyis thugs rdo rje'i mngon par zhen pa yongs su spong ba'o //
T02D1184:233b-5: lud pa dang ni sna bas dag gis //
T02D1184:233b-6: bsres nas padma'i snod du bzhag par bya zhing zhes
T02D1184:233b-7: pa'i bar gyis gsung rdo rje'i mngon par zhen pa
T02D1184:233b-9: da ni rdo rje gsum gyi mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang ba gsungs pa /
T02D1184:233b-10: smad g-yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang //
T02D1184:233b-11: ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin brgyan //
T02D1184:233b-12: me tog yi dags gnas rnyed pas //
T02D1184:233b-13: mgo skyes mchog ni bcing bar bya //
T02D1184:233b-14: sku chos 'byung nam mkha'i khams la g-yogs pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:233b-15: sna tshogs kyi sgras rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:233b-16: kha dog ces pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:233b-18: ro bsregs thal bas chos kyi dbyings bdag nyid mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyu yis so //
T02D1184:233b-19: 'di ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa ste /
T02D1184:233b-20: rdo rje gsum brgyan pa mchog bla ma dgu'i bdag
T02D1184:233b-21: nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1184:233b-22: phyir ro // de yang mgo skyes te spyi bor
T02D1184:233b-23: rang gi dbang por 'gyur ro zhes pa'i gsung las
T02D1184:233b-24: phyir ro // so // de ji ltar dgu'i bdag nyid can yin zhe na /
T02D1184:233b-26: me tog bdag med ma rnyed pa ni yi dags
T02D1184:233b-27: gnas rdo rje 'chang gi gnas su byang chub kyi
T02D1184:233b-28: sems kyi rang bzhin gyis bcing par bya'o //
T02D1184:233b-29: gnyis ka dbyer med par gnas par bya'o ;
T02D1184:233b-30: / de'i phyir dgu'i bdag nyid can zhes brjod do //
T02D1184:233b-31: kun rdzob kyi don ni smad g-yogs zhes pa sham thabs so //
T02D1184:233b-32: kha dog sna tshogs zhes pa stag gi pags pa'o //
T02D1184:233b-34: kha dog sna tshogs ni phyag dar khrod pa nyid do //
T02D1184:233b-35: ro bsregs thal bas brgyan zhes pa thal ba rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa de brgyan pa'o //
T02D1184:233b-36: me tog yi dags gnas zhes pa dur khrod gyi sa gzhir rnyed pas /
T02D1184:233b-37: mgo skyes mchog ni bcing bar bya //
T02D1184:233b-38: zhes pa'i bar gyis yul ma lus pa'i rnam par
T02D1184:233b-39: dag pa'o zhes shin tu gsal ba kho nar bstan
T02D1184:234a-0: te / bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa la sogs @234a * //
T02D1184:234a-1: pa'i bya ba rnams kyang dbang po rnam par dag
T02D1184:234a-2: pa med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes dogs
T02D1184:234a-3: nas / de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1184:234a-4: thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa //
T02D1184:234a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs te //
T02D1184:234a-6: nges par dbang po drug gi grangs //
T02D1184:234a-7: rnam par dag pa ma mdzad do //
T02D1184:234a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis yul gyi rnam par dag pa sngar gsungs te /
T02D1184:234a-9: dbang po drug gi rnam par dag pa ni ma gsungs so zhes rdo rje snying po'i zhu ba'o //
T02D1184:234a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1184:234a-12: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-13: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-14: sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad //
T02D1184:234a-15: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-16: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-17: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1184:234a-18: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-19: zhes pa gti mug rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1184:234a-20: rdo rje ma ni rnam par dag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1184:234a-21: 'dis ni gnyis ka dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa mig gi dbang po'o //
T02D1184:234a-22: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-23: zhes pa zhe sdang rdo rje ma dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa rna ba'i dbang po'o //
T02D1184:234a-24: sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad //
T02D1184:234a-25: ces pa ser sna dang rdo rje ma dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa sna'i dbang po'o //
T02D1184:234a-26: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-27: zhes pa 'od dpag med dang rdo rje ma dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa lce'i dbang po'o //
T02D1184:234a-28: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1184:234a-29: zhes pa phrag dog don yong grub pa dang de rnam par dag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1184:234a-30: de gnyis dbyer med pa rnam par dag pa lus kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1184:234a-31: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma /
T02D1184:234a-32: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa'i
T02D1184:234a-33: mkha' 'gro ma rnam par dag pa yid kyi dbang
T02D1184:234a-34: po'o zhes pa'o // dbang po rnams kyi rnam dag phyir //
T02D1184:234a-35: 'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che //
T02D1184:234a-36: gti mug la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis go cha brtan par g-yogs pa'o //
T02D1184:234a-38: dbang po mig la sogs pa rnams kyi ci'i don du zhe na /
T02D1184:234a-40: rnam dag phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ched du'o //
T02D1184:234a-41: de nyid kyi phyir sems dpa' che zhes pa rdo rje snying po la bod pa ste /
T02D1184:234a-42: sems dpa' chen po ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin nyid las /
T02D1184:234b-0: gang gi phyir @234b longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni
T02D1184:234b-1: 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba rab tu 'jug pa'o
T02D1184:234b-2: // rgyu de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje snying po yang sdud par byed pa po zhes brjod do //
T02D1184:234b-4: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
T02D1184:234b-6: de nyid thabs dang bcas pas ni //
T02D1184:234b-10: srid pa srid pa nyid kyis dag / ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1184:234b-11: da ni dbang po rnam par dag pa yongs su
T02D1184:234b-12: zhus pa na rnam par ma dag pa rnam par
T02D1184:234b-14: dgongs pa'i dam tshig gi brda dang tha snyad ni
T02D1184:234b-15: mtshon par dka'o zhes blo la gnas par mdzad nas
T02D1184:234b-16: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1184:234b-17: dgongs pa'i skad ni ci zhig brjod //
T02D1184:234b-18: rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che //
T02D1184:234b-19: nyan thos sogs kyis mi phigs pa //
T02D1184:234b-20: dgong dang lta ba dag dang ni //
T02D1184:234b-21: 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyis //
T02D1184:234b-22: bzhi po rnams kyi rgyud kyis ni //

T02D1184:254b-14: a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis kyi

T02D1184:269a-36: kha dog nag po la sogs pa yon tan dang

T02D1184:269a-38: sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di lta bu ste /
T02D1184:269a-39: gtso bo zhes pa nyid 'phrog pa po dang rang nyid byed pa po'o //
T02D1184:269a-40: grong khyed chos 'byung gzhal yas khang par bsgom zhing snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1184:269a-41: khyad par ci lta bu'i grong du zhe na /
T02D1184:269a-42: ma mo'i 'khor lor goo r'i la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs pa'i grong du'o //
T02D1184:269a-43: de nyid kyi phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
T02D1184:269a-44: yang na gang kha dog nag po zhes pa phra mo gyur pa ste /
T02D1184:269a-45: a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis nyid kyis cha dang bral ba'o //
T02D1184:269a-46: de nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa chen po gting dpag dka' ba'o //
T02D1184:269a-47: bdag med bde ba ni bdag med ma'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:269a-48: de sbyin zhing gtong ba'i phyir bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po'o //
T02D1184:269a-49: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma gsungs pa /
T02D1184:269a-50: dkar mo'i g-yas na gri gug ste //
T02D1184:269a-51: de bzhin g-yon na ro hi ta //
T02D1184:269a-52: chom rkun g-yas na cang te'u //
T02D1184:269b-0: @269b g-yon pa'i phyag na phag pa'o //
T02D1184:269b-1: ro langs ma g-yas rus sbal te //
T02D1184:269b-2: g-yon pa yos ni padma'i snod //
T02D1184:269b-3: ghasma r'i yi g-yas na sprul //
T02D1184:269b-4: g-yon pas rnal 'byor snod yin no //
T02D1184:269b-5: pukka s'i g-yas sang ga ste //
T02D1184:269b-6: de bzhin g-yon pas dgra sta'o //
T02D1184:269b-7: ri khrod ma g-yas dge slong ste //
T02D1184:269b-8: de bzhin g-yon pas gsil byed do //
T02D1184:269b-9: gdol pa mo g-yas 'khor lo ste //
T02D1184:269b-10: de bzhin g-yon pas thong pa'o //
T02D1184:269b-11: g-yung mo'i g-yas na rdo rje ste //
T02D1184:269b-12: de bzhin g-yon na sdigs mdzub bo //
T02D1184:269b-20: rdo rje rnams ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma rnams te /
T02D1184:269b-21: ro hi ta la sogs pa brgyad ni thabs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:269b-22: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1184:269b-23: dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis 'dod //
T02D1184:269b-24: spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ste //
T02D1184:269b-25: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1184:269b-26: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1184:269b-27: zhes pa nges par gnyis su med par gnas pas mtshon cing /
T02D1184:269b-28: brtan pa g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:269b-29: phyag gnyis zhes pa shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1184:269b-30: spyan gsum zhes pa rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:269b-31: skra ni gyen du zhes pa kam ye shes te /
T02D1184:269b-34: gyen du rgyas pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1184:269b-35: de nyid ni dbang po gtso bo ste /
T02D1184:269b-36: thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'i sbyor ba las dgu skra gyen du 'greng ba'o //
T02D1184:269b-37: de 'di rnams la yod pa'i phyir skra gyen du 'grang ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1184:269b-38: bzhi ba'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:269b-39: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1184:269b-40: zhes pa phyag rgya lnga yis mngon par rdzogs par
T02D1184:269b-41: byang chub pa'i rang bzhin nyid ces pa'i don no
T02D1184:269b-42: // 'dis ni dkyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas
T02D1184:269b-43: pa nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no
T02D1184:269b-44: // // phyag gnyis pa nyid kyis gnyis su med
T02D1184:269b-45: pa'i rang bzhin kho na gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid
T02D1184:269b-46: // // do // spyan gsum pa nyid kyis gnyis kyi rang bzhin gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:269b-47: dbu skra gyen du bsgreng ba nyid kyis gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid bzhi ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:269b-48: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa nyid kyis
T02D1184:269b-49: bzhi ba'i rang bzhin nyid lnga pa'i rang bzhin zhes
T02D1184:269b-50: pa ste / mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:269b-51: gyi dkyil 'khor mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1184:269b-52: pa ste / nyid gsungs pa'o // kha dog dbye ba so so gzhan //
T02D1184:270a-2: goo r'i kha dog nag mor 'gyur //
T02D1184:270a-3: tsoo r'i btsod dang mtshungs pa ste //
T02D1184:270a-4: ro langs ma ni gseng btsos bzhin //
T02D1184:270a-7: ri khrod zla ba chu shel 'dra //
T02D1184:270a-8: gtum mo nam mkha' sngo ba sangs mdog / g-yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes 'dod //
T02D1184:270a-9: yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor rnam par dag pas
T02D1184:270a-10: goo r'i la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi
T02D1184:270a-11: kha dog tha dad pa drug gi sngar gsungs pa'i
T02D1184:270a-13: dang por nag por bsgom par bya //
T02D1184:270a-14: gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom //
T02D1184:270a-15: gsum par ser po bsgom bya zhing //
T02D1184:270a-16: bzhi par ljang gu de bzhin no //
T02D1184:270a-17: lnga par kha dog sngon po dang //
T02D1184:270a-18: drug pa dkar po'i lugs can te //
T02D1184:270a-19: yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1184:270a-20: dga' bral mtha' yang de bzhin no //
T02D1184:270a-21: zhes pa dga' bral gyi mtha' lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1184:270a-22: de bzhin du gtum mo nam mkha' sdo bsangs mdog bya ba yang ste /
T02D1184:270a-23: g-yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes 'dod //
T02D1184:270a-24: ces pa dga' ba la sogs pa rnams kyang lhan
T02D1184:270a-25: cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir g-yung mo'i
T02D1184:270a-26: sna tshogs pa nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1184:270a-27: goo r'i la sogs pa'i gdan rnam par dag par gsungs pa /
T02D1184:270a-28: tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag / gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang //
T02D1184:270a-29: bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1184:270a-30: goo r'i la sogs rnams kyi gdan //
T02D1184:270a-32: dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa lha'i de kho na khong du chud pa'i phyir //
T02D1184:270a-33: sngags kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i don du bdag med mas zhes pa /
T02D1184:270a-34: bolla gzhib par mdzad nas ni //
T02D1184:270a-35: bcom ldan 'das la gus mchod de //
T02D1184:270a-36: dam 'khyud tsum ba na byed pas //
T02D1184:270a-37: bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so //
T02D1184:270a-38: bolla gzhib par mdzad nas ni //
T02D1184:270a-39: zhes pa rdo rje padma mnyam par sbyor ba mdzad nas //
T02D1184:270a-40: bcom ldan 'das la mchod de zhes pa rim pa 'di nyid kyis mchod nas //
T02D1184:270a-41: gus pa chags pa chen po'o //
T02D1184:270a-43: zhes pa kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba las zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:270a-44: bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngags //
T02D1184:270a-45: de bzhin gdug pa sdigs pa dang //
T02D1184:270a-46: klu rnams skrod par byed pa nyid /
T02D1184:270a-47: lha dang lha min rnams nyed pa //
T02D1184:270a-48: de ni nga yis bshad bya yis //
T02D1184:270a-49: lha mo bde ba sbyin pa nyon //
T02D1184:270a-50: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la //
T02D1184:270a-51: bdag gis gzhan du ma bstan to //
T02D1184:270b-0: @270b rdo rje sems dpa' gar mdzad pa //
T02D1184:270b-1: lha mo shin tu 'jigs ma ste //
T02D1184:270b-2: ngo mi chogs pas khyod la bshad //
T02D1184:270b-4: dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni //
T02D1184:270b-5: rdo rje snying po'i dbang sbyin phyir //
T02D1184:270b-6: til mchog ma ni bkug par gyur //
T02D1184:270b-7: bzlas pa khri yis gsal ba dang //
T02D1184:270b-8: sgra ring ba dang mdzes pa yis //
T02D1184:270b-9: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don gsal ba nyid do //
T02D1184:270b-10: don gzhan brjod par bya ste /
T02D1184:270b-11: bzlas pa khri yis zhes pa aa bdag med ma'o //
T02D1184:270b-12: des na 'di ni aa ldan dang sngags bzlas pa yang yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1184:270b-13: aa ldan pa bzlas pa de yis so //
T02D1184:270b-14: gsal ba zhes pa 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1184:270b-15: sgra ring ba ces pa n'a da mtha' dag gi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1184:270b-16: mdzes pa yis zhes pa yid 'phrog pas so //
T02D1184:270b-18: kye'i rdo rje'i sbyor ldan pas //
T02D1184:270b-19: btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya //
T02D1184:270b-20: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i ye shes nyid kyi dgug cing bsdu bar bya ste /
T02D1184:270b-21: de'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1184:270b-22: btsun mo thams cad ces pa spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D1184:270b-23: 'bum phrag bzlas pas rnal 'byor bdag /'di ni las kun byed par 'gyur //
T02D1184:270b-25: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis so //
T02D1184:270b-26: 'bum phrag bzlas pas zhes pa la ksham mtshon par byed pa ste /
T02D1184:270b-27: 'di ni 'bum dang sngags bzlas pa yang yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1184:270b-29: 'di ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa //
T02D1184:270b-30: rnal 'byor bdag ni rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:270b-31: las kun zhes pa gdug pa sdigs pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:270b-32: rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid ces pa ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1184:270b-34: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pas so /
T02D1184:270b-35: 'di nyid ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1184:270b-36: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:270b-38: rig byed rnams kyi dang po nyid //
T02D1184:270b-39: zla phyed thig les brgyan pa ste /
T02D1184:270b-40: aom yig ces pa'i don no //
T02D1184:270b-41: phyi nas aasht'a na n'a ya /
T02D1184:270b-43: tsa tu ra bim sha ti nee tr'a ya /
T02D1184:270b-44: de rjes sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02D1184:270b-45: krishna dz'i m'u ta wa pu she /
T02D1184:270b-46: ka p'a la m'a la aa ne ka dh'a ri ni /
T02D1184:270b-47: aargm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya //
T02D1184:270b-49: aom m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1184:270b-50: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1184:271a-0: @271a * // sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1184:271a-1: sa pta s'a ga r'a na /
T02D1184:271a-4: gri hna gri hna sha tr'um /
T02D1184:271a-5: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: phat sb'a h'a /
T02D1184:271a-6: yang na rig byed rnams kyi dang po zhes pa
T02D1184:271a-7: me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga
T02D1184:271a-8: po rnams kyi nye bar len par gyur pa'o //
T02D1184:271a-9: de nyid zla phyed ni rlung dang n'a da zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:271a-10: thig le ni aindu zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:271a-11: phyi nas zhes pa mtha' ma'o //
T02D1184:271a-12: aasht'a na n'a ya ces pa aa na na gnas te /
T02D1184:271a-13: a'a li k'a li n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis so //
T02D1184:271a-15: de ni aa sht'a na n'a zhes pa n'a da'i
T02D1184:271a-16: rang bzhin cha dang bcas pa nyid ji sid cha
T02D1184:271a-17: dang bral ba'i n'a da zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:271a-18: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a yang ye shes ta /
T02D1184:271a-19: de ni gang zhig aasht'a na n'a ya zhes pa bod pa'i tshig go //
T02D1184:271a-20: de nyid kyi phyir ping gordhva ke sha bartma ne khyod la zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:271a-22: ke sha bde ba'i dbang po zla ba ste /
T02D1184:271a-23: de ni ping go rdhva ke sha gang g'i bartma lam de'i ched du'o //
T02D1184:271a-24: slar yang bod pa tsa tur bi sha ti nee
T02D1184:271a-25: tv'a ya ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang
T02D1184:271a-26: bzhin ni mkha' 'gro ma brgyad po rnams te /
T02D1184:271a-27: de rnams kyang re re la ye shes gsum gyi
T02D1184:271a-28: bdag nyid kyis spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:271a-29: te / de nyid gang gi aa ya ye shes de bod pa'o //
T02D1184:271a-30: de rjes sho da sha bhu dz'a ya mkha' 'gro
T02D1184:271a-31: ma brgyad po rnams shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1184:271a-32: bzhin nyid kyis bcu drug ste /
T02D1184:271a-33: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa sho da sha ghu dz'a'o //
T02D1184:271a-34: de nyid kyi phyir a'a ya gang gi ye shes de bod pa'o //
T02D1184:271a-35: krishna dza'i m'u ta wa pu she 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1184:271a-36: rang bzhin chos kyi sku khyod kyi phyir zhes pa'o
T02D1184:271a-37: // k'a p'a la m'a la a'a ne ka dh'a
T02D1184:271a-38: ri ne zhes pa mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1184:271a-39: rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mngon par
T02D1184:271a-40: rdzogs par byang chub pa mtshon pa'o //
T02D1184:271a-41: aadham'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya zhes pa aadhm'a ta
T02D1184:271a-42: nyid kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do
T02D1184:271a-43: // kr'u ra nyid kyis don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1184:271a-44: gang zhig bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can de ni tsitt'a zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:271a-46: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a ya gang gis ye shes de bod pa'o //
T02D1184:271a-47: aardhva aindu dam shtra'i ne zhes pa aardhva aindu n'a da ste /
T02D1184:271a-48: thabs kyi yan lag nyid kyis k'a li'i phreng ba
T02D1184:271a-49: cung zad gsal ba'i da dha da dha ya la
T02D1184:271a-50: rnams dang lhan cig n'a da bzhi bcu'o //
T02D1184:271a-51: de nyid gang gi mche bar gyur pa de ni aardhva aandu dam shtr'i ne zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:271b-1: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1184:271b-4: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1184:271b-6: bandha bandha n'a ga aashd'a k'a na /
T02D1184:271b-9: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha:/
T02D1184:271b-10: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi rang bzhin
T02D1184:271b-11: shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa nyid rab tu
T02D1184:271b-12: bstan te / kha sbyor mngon par gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1184:271b-13: ri r'i li l'i dbyangs bzhi'i sbyor ba ma bstan te /
T02D1184:271b-14: ma ning nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1184:271b-16: dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni //
T02D1184:271b-18: dkyil 'khor de'i don nyid lha mos zhus pa'i sgo nas gsungs pa /
T02D1184:271b-19: de la lha mo de dgyes nas ;
T02D1184:271b-20: / bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1184:271b-23: der ni ston pa ye shes che //
T02D1184:271b-25: der ni zhes pa da bang bskur ba sbyin pa'i dus su'o //
T02D1184:271b-26: ston pa zhes pa 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
T02D1184:271b-27: ye shes che zhes pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
T02D1184:271b-28: de ni ma gzigs pa dang /
T02D1184:271b-30: ma rig pa cung zad kyang med pa'o //
T02D1184:271b-31: rang nyid dkyil 'khor rdul tshon gyi rang bzhin 'dri bar mdzad do //
T02D1184:271b-32: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyar nas //
T02D1184:271b-33: dgyes pa'i thugs ni mnyam bzhag ste //
T02D1184:271b-34: rim pa gcig pa sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1184:271b-36: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1184:271b-37: rdo rje srad bu rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1184:271b-38: re kh'a lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1184:271b-39: de nas bum pa brgyad po dgod //
T02D1184:271b-40: rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am //
T02D1184:271b-41: yang na 'bras la sogs pa yis //
T02D1184:271b-42: dur khrod so phag gis kyang ste //
T02D1184:271b-43: de bzhin dur khrod sol bas so //
T02D1184:271b-45: ze bar bcas pa bri bar bya //
T02D1184:271b-46: snying por thod pa cha gsum pa //
T02D1184:271b-47: kha dog dkar po bri bar bya //
T02D1184:271b-48: dbang ldan du ni sha ra bha //
T02D1184:271b-49: me yi mtshams su dge slong bri //
T02D1184:271b-50: bden bral du ni 'khor lo bri //
T02D1184:271b-51: rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02D1184:271b-52: shar sgor de bzhin gri gug ste //
T02D1184:271b-53: lho ru cang te'u bri bar bya ;
T02D1184:271b-54: / nub tu rus sbal bri bya zhing //
T02D1184:271b-56: lha mo'i kha dog dbye ba yis //
T02D1184:271b-57: phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags //
T02D1184:271b-58: dbus su thod pa dkar po yang //
T02D1184:271b-59: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri //
T02D1184:271b-60: de nas rnam rgyal bum pa dgod //
T02D1184:271b-61: yal ga'i rtsa mo gos bzangs can //
T02D1184:272a-2: sha li skyes pas yongs gang ba'o //
T02D1184:272a-3: mang du rab tu brjod pas ci //
T02D1184:272a-4: ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yis //
T02D1184:272a-5: dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya //
T02D1184:272a-6: sgra ji bzhin ba'i don rab tu gsal ba nyid do //
T02D1184:272a-8: rim pa gcig bzhes pa rim pa kha sbyor te /
T02D1184:272a-10: sgo bzhi pa zhes pa dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:272a-13: mngon par shes pa drug gi yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:272a-14: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1184:272a-15: zhes pa gzhan dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:272a-16: rdo rje srad bu rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1184:272a-17: zhes pa rdo rje rigs kyi dbang po ste /
T02D1184:272a-18: srad bu aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1184:272a-19: gnyis ka bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid las gnyis la mang po'i tshig go //
T02D1184:272a-20: rdo rje srad bus brgyan zhes pa ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:272a-21: re kh'a lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1184:272a-22: zhes pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:272a-23: de nas bum pa brgyad ces pa de nyid kyi
T02D1184:272a-24: phyir ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin nyid sku gsum dang
T02D1184:272a-25: lhan cig brgyad de tshogs nyid kyi rang bzhin rgyu
