T02D1184:287b-20: byin za yang dag ra dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-21: ro langs ma yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1184:287b-22: zhes pa ae yig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-23: mthar gnas rnams kyi gsum pa zhes pa la yig ste /
T02D1184:287b-24: ghasma r'i yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1184:287b-25: zhes pa aom yig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-26: dang po yi ni dang po zhes pa ka yig ste /
T02D1184:287b-27: mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po sbyar //
T02D1184:287b-28: zhes pa ya yig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-29: rdo rje ma yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1184:287b-30: zhes pa aa yig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-31: ksha yig chom rkun ma yis brgyan //
T02D1184:287b-32: zhes pa ae yig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-33: lnga pa'i dang po zhes pa pa yig go //
T02D1184:287b-34: sushma rnams kyi bzhi pa zhes pa ha yig ste /
T02D1184:287b-35: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan //
T02D1184:287b-36: zhes pa au yig thung du ste de dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-37: stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te /
T02D1184:287b-38: phat dang mthar ni sv'a h'a sbyar phyag gnyis pa'i snying pa'o ;
T02D1184:287b-39: / aom tree lo ky'a kshe ba h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:287b-40: 'dis kha sbyor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D1184:287b-41: sngags btu ba mtha' dag bsdus pa gsungs pa /
T02D1184:287b-43: dang po'i dang po ka yig go //
T02D1184:287b-44: gnyis pa'i dang po tsa yig go //
T02D1184:287b-45: gsum pa'i dang po da yig go //
T02D1184:287b-46: bzhi pa'i dang po ta yig go //
T02D1184:287b-47: lnga ba'i dang po pa yig go //
T02D1184:287b-48: mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ya yig go //
T02D1184:287b-49: aushma rnams kyi dang po sha yig go //
T02D1184:287b-50: dang bo rnam snang mthar sv'a h'a //
T02D1184:287b-51: zhes pa aom aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sv'a h'a /
T02D1184:287b-52: grong khyer dkrugs pa'i sngags te bzlas pa ni 'bum mo zhes gsungs so //
T02D1184:287b-53: bdag med ma zhes pa chos 'byung ste /
T02D1184:287b-54: de nyid dang bo'i dang po dga' ba'o //
T02D1184:288a-2: gsum pa'i dang po dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
T02D1184:288a-3: bzhi ba'i dang po lhan cig skyes ba'i dga' ba ste /
T02D1184:288a-4: 'dis lnga pa'i dang po thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:288a-5: mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:288a-6: aushma rnams kyi dang po sku rdo rje ste /
T02D1184:288a-7: dang por rnam snang aom yig rdo rje gsum dbyer
T02D1184:288a-8: med pa dang mthar sv'a h'a ye shes lnga'i rang
T02D1184:288a-9: bzhin ni rgyu brgyad nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1184:288a-10: da ni chos 'byung gi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa nyid kyi sngags btu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1184:288a-11: mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa zhes pa ra yig
T02D1184:288a-12: dang ksha yig gnyis zhes par ksha raksha zhes pa'o
T02D1184:288a-13: // h'um yig gsum zhes pa h'um h'um h'um zhes pa'o /
T02D1184:288a-14: dang por rnam snang phat yig gi //
T02D1184:288a-15: rnam pa nang bcug mthar sv'a h'a //
T02D1184:288a-16: zhes pa sa spyang ba'i sngags ma ning gi sngags kyi le'u gsungs pa nyid de /
T02D1184:288a-17: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1184:288a-18: rang bzhin dgu'i bdag nyid can nyid mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1184:288a-19: bco lnga'i rang bzhin rtag tu goms par byed pa
T02D1184:288a-20: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa gsungs pa /
T02D1184:288a-21: dang po rnam snang zhes pa thog mar aom yig go //
T02D1184:288a-22: de'i rjes su rdo rje ma aa yig ste /
T02D1184:288a-24: mtha' ru h'um zhes pa rdo rje gsum gyi yi ge aom a'a: h'um zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:288a-25: bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlab ces pa
T02D1184:288a-26: srung ba dang bza' ba'i dam tshig byin gyis brlab
T02D1184:288a-27: pa nyid las rdo rje gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs
T02D1184:288a-28: pa shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D1184:288a-30: de nyid kyi phyir 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags btu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1184:288a-31: dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid /
T02D1184:288a-32: de rjes aa k'a ro mu kham /
T02D1184:288a-33: aushma rnams kyi gsum pa sa yig go //
T02D1184:288a-34: mthar gnas rnams kyi bzhi pa wa yig ste /
T02D1184:288a-35: steng du me yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1184:288a-36: steng ngur yig gis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D1184:288a-37: dharm'a n'am de rjes rdo rje ma byin la zhes pa a'a yig sbyin pa'o //
T02D1184:288a-39: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:288a-40: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'm a'a
T02D1184:288a-41: dya nu tpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a
T02D1184:288a-42: h'a zhes pa 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i
T02D1184:288a-44: sngags kyi don ni sngags kyi le'ur gsungs pa'i phyir slar 'dir ma gsungs so //
T02D1184:288a-45: 'di ni kha sbyor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sngags
T02D1184:288a-46: btu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o zhes pa kye'i rdo
T02D1184:288a-47: rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med
T02D1184:288a-48: pa las brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u dgu pa'o //
T02D1184:288b-0: da ni kha sbyor 'byed @288b pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sngags btu ba gsungs nas /
T02D1184:288b-1: sngags ba zlas ba'i yul gsungs pa /
T02D1184:288b-2: de nas chos kun sdom gcig pa'i //
T02D1184:288b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs /
T02D1184:288b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1184:288b-6: thams cad kyi tshe chos ston pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa'o /
T02D1184:288b-7: da ni slar gsung rdo rje'i skabs su longs spyod
T02D1184:288b-8: rdzogs pa'i sku nyid kyis gsal bar rnam par gnas
T02D1184:288b-9: pa'o // de ci ltar zhe na /
T02D1184:288b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1184:288b-12: de nyid kyi phyir chos kun sdom gcig pa chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
T02D1184:288b-13: bdag med tsumba na mdzad nas //
T02D1184:288b-14: bdag med ma la tsumba na mdzad pas gsung rdo rje mngon par gsal bar gsungs so //
T02D1184:288b-15: bzlas pa'i yul ni rab gsal mdzad //
T02D1184:288b-16: sngags kyi kha sbyor dbye ba gsungs pa ste /
T02D1184:288b-17: shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D1184:288b-18: rengs pa'i yul la shel gyi bgrang phreng gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1184:288b-19: shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa zhes pa 'od gsal ba nyid mchog tu g-yo ba med pa'o //
T02D1184:288b-20: dbang la tsandan dmar po ste /
T02D1184:288b-21: dbang du byed pa la tsandan dmar po'i bgrang phreng gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1184:288b-22: dbang du bya ba dbang du gyur pa la tsandan dga' bar byed pa ste /
T02D1184:288b-23: dmar po chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1184:288b-24: lung tang gis ni mngon spyod nyid //
T02D1184:288b-25: mngon spyod kyi yul la lung tang gi bgrang phreng gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1184:288b-26: lung tang zhes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las /
T02D1184:288b-27: mngon spyod ces pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don nges pa nyid do //
T02D1184:288b-28: de bzhin sdang la ni rang shus dbyi ba'i yul
T02D1184:288b-29: la ni rang shus zhes pa mi'i rus pa'i bgrang
T02D1184:288b-31: yang na sdang ba rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
T02D1184:288b-32: ni rang shu ni ye shes te /
T02D1184:288b-33: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:288b-34: rta yi rus pas skrod pa la //
T02D1184:288b-35: skrod pa'i yul la rta'i rus pa'i bgrang phreng gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1184:288b-36: skrod pa zhes pa gnas nas bskyod pa'o //
T02D1184:288b-37: rta ni don yod grub pa rlung rdo rje ste /
T02D1184:288b-38: de'i rus pa ni de'i 'od zer zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:288b-39: bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa nyid /
T02D1184:288b-40: bram ze'i rus pas zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1184:288b-41: rigs kyi rus pa'i bgrang phreng gis dgug pa'i yul
T02D1184:289a-1: gang bram ze'i rus pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rtogs pas dgug pa sdud pa'o //
T02D1184:289a-2: glang po'i rus pas char dbab pa /
T02D1184:289a-3: char dbab ba'i yul la glang po che'i rus pa'i bgrang phreng gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1184:289a-5: char pa dbab pa zhes pa byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba ste /
T02D1184:289a-6: glang po che'i rus ba zhes pa 'od dpag med
T02D1184:289a-7: dang dbyer med pa'i don yod grub pa'i ye shes
T02D1184:289a-9: ma he'i rus pas gsad pa'o //
T02D1184:289a-10: zhes pa gsad pa'i yul la ma he'i rus pa'i bgrang phreng gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1184:289a-11: yang na gang gsad pa zhes pa dbang po dang
T02D1184:289a-12: yul dang rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par
T02D1184:289a-14: ma he'i rus pa zhes pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1184:289a-15: rengs par 'o ma'i btung ba nyid /
T02D1184:289a-16: rengs par byed pa'i dus na 'o ma'i btud ba bya'o //
T02D1184:289a-17: dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad ;
T02D1184:289a-18: / ces pa dbang gi bya ba la rang gi 'dun pas spyad de /
T02D1184:289a-19: ji ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya'o //
T02D1184:289a-20: gsad pa la ni sih'a nyid //
T02D1184:289a-21: ces pa sih'a nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1184:289a-22: dgug pa la ni gzhi mnyam ste /
T02D1184:289a-23: sdang la sh'a linydza ru brjod //
T02D1184:289a-24: de bzhin skrod la gla rtsi'o //
T02D1184:289a-30: ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin nyid de gsungs
T02D1184:289a-31: pa'i sh'a linydza nyid ni na dang go dang so
T02D1184:289a-32: can rnams zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:289a-34: rengs par byed pa dang dbang du byed pa dang /
T02D1184:289a-38: bskrad pa ste las drug po 'di rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon dang /
T02D1184:289a-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i sa bon bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1184:289a-40: de la 'o ma'i btung ba zhes pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1184:289a-41: rang gi 'dun pa zhes pa de 'byung ba na
T02D1184:289a-42: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid do
T02D1184:289a-44: gzhi mnyam dang sh'a linydza dang /
T02D1184:289a-45: gla rtsi rnams gsungs pa nyid de /
T02D1184:289a-46: nang gi bdag nyid can mig la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1184:289a-47: phyi rol gyi yang gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:289a-48: mtha'i shva la sogs pa rnams ni gnyis ka dbyer med pa nyid de /
T02D1184:289b-0: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi @289b dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:289b-1: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa kha sbyor 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa'o //
T02D1184:289b-3: zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin
T02D1184:289b-4: tu dri ma med pa las brtag pa gnyis pa'i
T02D1184:289b-6: /'dis ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sku gnyis bstan nas /
T02D1184:289b-7: da ni lus can rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pas
T02D1184:289b-8: chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pa ye shes lnga
T02D1184:289b-9: dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid bstan par bya
T02D1184:289b-11: kyee rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing /
T02D1184:289b-12: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
T02D1184:289b-13: lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs //
T02D1184:289b-14: de la bdag med mas zhus pa //
T02D1184:289b-15: dam du 'khyud pa nyid las kye'i rdo rje nyid do //
T02D1184:289b-16: tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni //
T02D1184:289b-17: zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rgyu nyid kyis kye'i rdo rje nyid do //
T02D1184:289b-18: skabs de la bdag med mas zhus pa /
T02D1184:289b-21: lus can skye ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi gzugs te /
T02D1184:289b-22: de ltar gyur pa'i kam ye shes so //
T02D1184:289b-23: bha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni //
T02D1184:289b-25: bha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni //
T02D1184:289b-26: zhes pa rdo rje 'chang dang bdag med ma dbyer
T02D1184:289b-27: med par gyur pa na 'khor lo'i 'dren pas de
T02D1184:289b-28: skad gsungs so // lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis //
T02D1184:289b-29: shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon //
T02D1184:289b-30: lus can skye ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rang gi
T02D1184:289b-31: rigs gang dang gang gi rigs gang yin pa de
T02D1184:289b-32: bshad cing brjod par bya yis kye shes rab kyi
T02D1184:289b-33: pha rol tu phyin ma nyon cig ces pa'o //
T02D1184:289b-35: bud med dam ni skyes pa yi //
T02D1184:289b-36: gang gi ming med tsa ba la //
T02D1184:289b-37: rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa //
T02D1184:289b-38: mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid //
T02D1184:289b-39: bud med lag pa g-yon pa'i ming med dang /
T02D1184:289b-40: skyes pa'i lag pa g-yas pa'i ming med de /
T02D1184:289b-41: de la gal te rdo rje rtse dgu pa'i mtshan
T02D1184:289b-42: ma yod pa de'i tshe skyes pa mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1184:289b-45: ming med ni bdag med ma ste //
T02D1184:289b-46: rtsa pa ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:289b-47: gnyis ka'i ye shes su gyur pa na gang gi zhes pa ma ning ste /
T02D1184:289b-50: rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1184:290a-1: dgu'i bdag nyid can nyid do //
T02D1184:290a-2: bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ste /
T02D1184:290a-3: gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang skabs dang gnas skabs so sor bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1184:290a-4: mi bskyod pa'i rigs mchog ces pa 'di gtso bo nyid do //
T02D1184:290a-6: zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi 'khor lo mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:290a-7: dpag med mgo na gyi 'dam skyes nyid //
T02D1184:290a-8: 'od dpag med kyi rigs kyi mtshan ma padmar 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:290a-9: rin chen 'byung gi rin chen che /
T02D1184:290a-10: rin po che'i rigs kyi mtshan ma rin po cher 'gyur ro ;
T02D1184:290a-11: / las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid //
T02D1184:290a-12: don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma ral grir 'gyur ro //
T02D1184:290a-13: 'khor lo snang ba rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:290a-14: padma mngon par brjod pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1184:290a-15: rin po che yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:290a-16: ral gri ni mi shes pa thams cad gcod pa
T02D1184:290a-17: nyid kyis rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa lhan cig
T02D1184:290a-18: skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'bras bur gyur pa'o //
T02D1184:290a-19: rtse dgu pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'i rigs gnyis ka mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ste /
T02D1184:290a-20: rigs ma 'chol pa nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1184:290a-21: dngos grub 'bad pa med pa nyid kyis mngon du
T02D1184:290a-23: rang 'dod lha'i rigs kyis spyod pa bya zhes gang gsungs pa de shin tu nges pa'o //
T02D1184:290a-24: 'dis ni mtshan ma rnams par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gsungs pa'o //
T02D1184:290a-25: gzhan yang kha dog gi mtshan ma gsungs pa /
T02D1184:290a-26: rnal 'byor pa gang nag po che //
T02D1184:290a-27: de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D1184:290a-28: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1184:290a-29: gnyis ka la yang mtshan ma 'di'o //
T02D1184:290a-30: rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che //
T02D1184:290a-31: de yi lha ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1184:290a-32: rnal 'byor pa gang sngo bsangs che //
T02D1184:290a-33: de yi lha ni don yod nyid //
T02D1184:290a-34: rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che //
T02D1184:290a-35: rin chen dbang po rigs kyi lha //
T02D1184:290a-36: rnal 'byor ba gang dmar ser nyid //
T02D1184:290a-37: 'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lha //
T02D1184:290a-38: rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser //
T02D1184:290a-39: de ni sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur //
T02D1184:290a-40: 'dis ni nag po mi bskyod pa thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:290a-41: dkar po rnam par snang mdzad sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:290a-42: sngo bsangs don yod grub pa gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1184:290a-43: gang yang ser po che bde ni rin chen dbang
T02D1184:290b-0: po @290b zhes pa rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa
T02D1184:290b-2: rnal 'byor pa gang dmar ser zhes pa dmar po
T02D1184:290b-3: rin chen dbang po dang ser po 'od dpag med
T02D1184:290b-4: de / de dag gang la yod pa de'i rigs kyi lha 'od dpag med do //
T02D1184:290b-5: dkar dang ser zhes pa 'od de gsal ba ste /
T02D1184:290b-6: 'od gsal ba nyid kyis de ni sems dpa'i rigs zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs te /
T02D1184:290b-7: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1184:290b-8: 'dis ni thugs rdo rje dang sku rdo rje dang /
T02D1184:290b-9: gsung rdo rje rnams kyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1184:290b-10: rin chen dbang po ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1184:290b-11: 'od dpag med ni de'i thabs su gyur pa'o ;
T02D1184:290b-12: / rdo rje sems dpa' yang rnam pa thams cad
T02D1184:290b-13: mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D1184:290b-14: ste / kha dog gi mtshan ma gsungs pa'o //
T02D1184:290b-16: skye bo rnams la brnyas mi bya //

T02D1184:293b-32: po'o // po'o // rked pa'i mtshams su sv'a yig kha dog ser po'o //
T02D1184:293b-33: brla zung la h'a yig kha dog ljang gu'o zhes pa bsams nas /
T02D1184:293b-34: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa byin gyis brlab
T02D1184:293b-35: pa rdo rje padma mnyam par sbyor ba na bsgrub
T02D1184:293b-36: par bya'o // aom a'a: h'um zhes pa sku gsum gyi rang bzhin sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1184:293b-37: sv'a h'a zhes pa ye shes lnga ste /
T02D1184:293b-38: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga po nyid dgu'i bdag
T02D1184:293b-39: nyid can yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo
T02D1184:293b-40: rje theg pa chen po gsang sngags kha sbyor 'byed
T02D1184:293b-42: sngags btubs sbrul ba'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1184:293b-43: sngags bzlas pas longs spyod pa'i sku'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1184:293b-44: lhan cig skyes pa'i don gyi sbyor bas chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no /
T02D1184:294a-1: bzhi pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1184:294a-2: sku'i rang bzhin brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1184:294a-3: no // brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa las
T02D1184:294a-4: phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can kye'i
T02D1184:294a-5: rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so /
T02D1184:294a-7: // / brtag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa las phyung
T02D1184:294a-8: ba brtag pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin kye'i rdo rje'i
T02D1184:294a-9: rgyud kyi rgyal po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T02D1184:294a-10: nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1184:294a-11: te / rdzogs so zhes pa kha sbyor gyi rang
T02D1184:294a-12: bzhin nyid kyis thams cad la khyab pa nyid ces
T02D1184:294a-13: te / pa'o // zhes pa kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel
T02D1184:294a-14: bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa las
T02D1184:294a-15: brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /
T02D1184:294a-17: // / he ru ka ni zhal brgyad pa yi rim pa zung gis yongs khyab pa //
T02D1184:294a-18: grub pa kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa'i 'di ni rab brjod nas //
T02D1184:294a-19: dge ba gang zhig bsags pa de yis kye yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor las //
T02D1184:294a-20: sems can thams cad srid pa rnam par dag pa'i dngos grub bstan gyur cig /
T02D1184:294a-21: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad
T02D1184:294a-22: kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med ba zhes bya
T02D1184:294a-23: ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po dham ka d'a
T02D1184:294a-26: // / smin drug zla ba la ni pandi ta mchog dpal ldan chos kyi rgyal po'i bkas //
T02D1184:294a-27: kye yi rdo rje'i 'grel bshad yon tan mchog ldan dham ka d'a shas mdzad pa ni //
T02D1184:294a-28: gang zhig dpal ldan kha che'i yul du 'khrungs pa dri med dpal zhes mtshan gsol dang //
T02D1184:294a-29: sthi ra ma ti'i rnam rgyas mdzes pa'i ngag gis 'dir ni legs par bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1184:294a-30: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan
T02D1184:294a-31: mtha' yas pa brnyes pa bla ma dam pa chos
T02D1184:294a-32: kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung gis dpon zhang btsun gyis
T02D1184:294a-33: yon bdag byas te phyi dang nang gi gzhung lugs
T02D1184:294a-34: rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa kha che'i pandi
T02D1184:294a-35: ta chen po bi ma la shr'i bha dra'i zhal
T02D1184:294a-36: snga nas / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge srang
T02D1184:294a-37: blo brtan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du
T02D1184:294a-38: legs par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i
T02D1184:294a-39: yi ge pa ni dge slong bsod nams dbang phyug
T02D1184:294a-41: / gang dang gang gis 'di la 'bad pa'i dge ba'i mthus //
T02D1184:294a-42: skye ba skye bar skye bo'i tshogs pa mtha' dag gis //
T02D1184:294a-43: 'di dang 'di lta'i rdo rje theg pa zab mo'i don //
